name: Aragorn
text: Response: After Aragorn commits to a quest, spend 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.

name: Théodred
text: Response: After Theodred commits to a quest, choose a hero committed to that quest. Add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.

name: Glóin
text: Response: After Gloin suffers damage, add 1 resource to his resource pool for each point of damage he just suffered.

name: Gimli
text: Gimli gets +1 [attack] for each damage token on him.

name: Legolas
text: Response: After Legolas participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, place 2 progress tokens on the current quest.

name: Thalin
text: While Thalin is committed to a quest, deal 1 damage to each enemy as it is revealed by the encounter deck.

name: Éowyn
text: Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to give Eowyn +1 [willpower] until the end of the phase. This effect may be triggered by each player once each round.

name: Eleanor
text: Response: Exhaust Eleanor to cancel the "when revealed" effects of a treachery card just revealed by the encounter deck. Then, discard that card, and replace it with the next card from the encounter deck.

name: Dunhere
text: Dunhere can target enemies in the staging area when he attacks alone. When doing so, he gets +1 [attack].

name: Denethor
text: Action: Exhaust Denethor to look at the top card of the encounter deck. You may move that card to the bottom of the deck.

name: Glorfindel
text: Action: Pay 1 resource from Glorfindel's pool to heal 1 damage on any character. (Limit once per round.)

name: Beravor
text: Action: Exhaust Beravor to choose a player. That player draws 2 cards. Limit once per round.

name: Faramir
text: Action: Exhaust Faramir to choose a player. Each character controlled by that player gets +1 [willpower] until the end of the phase.

name: Son of Arnor
text: Response: After Son of Arnor enters play, choose an enemy card in the staging area or currently engaged with another player. Engage that enemy.

name: Snowbourn Scout
text: Response: After Snowbourn Scout enters play, choose a location. Place 1 progress token on that location.

name: Longbeard Orc Slayer
text: Response: After Longbeard Orc Slayer enters play, deal 1 damage to each Orc enemy in play.

name: Brok Ironfist
text: Response: After a Dwarf hero you control leaves play, put Brok Ironfist into play from your hand.

name: Ever Vigilant
text: Action: Choose and ready 1 ally card.

name: Common Cause
text: Action: Exhaust 1 hero you control to choose and ready a different hero.

name: For Gondor!
text: Action: Until the end of the phase, all characters get +1 [attack]. All Gondor characters also get +1 [defense] until the end of the phase.

name: Sneak Attack
text: Action: Put 1 ally card into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that ally is still in play, return it to your hand.

name: Valiant Sacrifice
text: Response: After an ally card leaves play, that card's controller draws 2 cards.

name: Grim Resolve
text: Action: Ready all character cards in play.

name: Steward of Gondor
text: Attached hero gains the Gondor trait.  Action: Exhaust Steward of Gondor to add 2 resources to attached hero's resource pool.

name: Celebrían's Stone
text: Attached hero gains +2 [willpower].  If attached hero is Aragorn, he also gains a [spirit] resource icon.

name: Gondorian Spearman
text: Response: After Gondorian Spearman is declared as a defender, deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.

name: Beorn
text: Action: Beorn gains +5 [attack] until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase in which you trigger this effect, shuffle Beorn back into your deck. (Limit once per round.)

name: Blade Mastery
text: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains +1 [attack] and +1 [defense].

name: Rain of Arrows
text: Action: Exhaust a character you control with the ranged keyword to choose a player. Deal 1 damage to each enemy engaged with that player.

name: Feint
text: Combat Action: Choose an enemy engaged with a player. That enemy cannot attack that player this phase.

name: Quick Strike
text: Action: Exhaust a character you control to immediately declare it as an attacker (and resolve its attack) against any eligible enemy target.

name: Thicket of Spears
text: You must use resources from 3 different heroes' pools to pay for this card.  Action: Choose a player. That player's engaged enemies cannot attack that player this phase.

name: Swift Strike
text: Response: After a character is declared as a defender, deal 2 damage to the attacking enemy.

name: Stand Together
text: Action: Choose a player. That player may declare any number of his eligible characters as defenders against each enemy attacking him this phase.

name: Blade of Gondolin
text: Attached hero gets +1 [attack] when attacking an Orc .  Response: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy, place 1  progress token on the current quest.

name: Citadel Plate
text: Attached hero gets +4 Hit Points.

name: Dwarven Axe
text: Attached hero gains +1 [attack]. (+2 [attack] instead if attached hero is a Dwarf.)

name: Horn of Gondor
text: Response: After a character leaves play, add 1 resource to attached hero's pool.

name: Wandering Took
text: Action: Reduce your threat by 3 to give control of Wandering Took to another player. Raise that player's threat by 3.

name: Lórien Guide
text: Response: After Lorien Guide commits to a quest, place 1 progress token on the active location.

name: Northern Tracker
text: Response: After Northern Tracker commits to a quest, place 1 progress token on each location in the staging area.

name: The Galadhrim's Greeting
text: Action: Reduce one player's threat by 6, or reduce each player's threat by 2.

name: Strength of Will
text: Response: After you travel to a location, exhaust a [spirit] character to place 2 progress tokens on that location.

name: Hasty Stroke
text: Response: Cancel a shadow effect just triggered during combat.

name: Will of the West
text: Action: Choose a player. Shuffle that player's discard pile back into his deck.

name: A Test of Will
text: Response: Cancel the "when revealed" effects of a card that was just revealed from the encounter deck.

name: Stand and Fight
text: Action: Choose an ally with a printed cost of X in any player's discard pile. Put that ally into play under your control. (The chosen ally can belong to any sphere of influence.)

name: A Light in the Dark
text: Action: Choose an enemy engaged with a player. Return that enemy to the staging area.

name: Dwarven Tomb
text: Action: Return 1 [spirit] card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Fortune or Fate
text: Action: Choose a hero in any player's discard pile. Put that card into play, under its owner's control.

name: The Favor of the Lady
text: Attached hero gains +1 [willpower].

name: Power in the Earth
text: Attached location gets -1 [threat].

name: Unexpected Courage
text: Action: Exhaust Unexpected Courage to ready attached hero.

name: Daughter of the Nimrodel
text: Action: Exhaust Daughter of the Nimrodel to heal up to 2 damage on any 1 hero.

name: Erebor Hammersmith
text: Response: After you play Erebor Hammersmith, return the topmost attachment in any player's discard pile to his hand.

name: Henamarth Riversong
text: Action: Exhaust Henamarth Riversong to look at the top card of the encounter deck.

name: Miner of the Iron Hills
text: Response: After Miner of the Iron Hills enters play, choose and discard 1 Condition attachment from play.

name: Gléowine
text: Action: Exhaust Gleowine to choose a player. That player draws 1 card.

name: Lore of Imladris
text: Action: Choose a character. Heal all damage from that character.

name: Lórien's Wealth
text: Action: Choose a player. That player draws 3 cards.

name: Radagast's Cunning
text: Quest Action: Choose an enemy in the staging area. Until the end of the phase, that enemy does not contribute its [threat].

name: Secret Paths
text: Quest Action: Choose a location in the staging area. Until the end of the phase, that location does not contribute its [threat].

name: Gandalf's Search
text: Action: Look at the top X cards of any player's deck, add 1 of those cards to its owner's hand, and return the rest to the top of the deck in any order.

name: Beorn's Hospitality
text: Action: Choose a player. Heal all damage on each hero controlled by that player.

name: Forest Snare
keywords: Attach to an enemy engaged with a player.
text: Attached enemy cannot attack.

name: Protector of Lórien
text: Action: Discard a card from your hand to give attached hero +1 [defense] or +1 [willpower] until the end of the phase. Limit 3 times per phase.

name: Dark Knowledge
keywords: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gets -1 [willpower].
text: Response: Exhaust Dark Knowledge to look at 1 shadow card that was just dealt to an enemy attacking you.

name: Self Preservation
text: Action: Exhaust Self Preservation to heal 2 points of damage from attached character.

name: Gandalf
keywords: At the end of the round, discard Gandalf from play.
text: Response: After Gandalf enters play, (choose 1): draw 3 cards, deal 4 damage to 1 enemy in play, or reduce your threat by 5.

name: King Spider
text: When Revealed: Each player must choose and exhaust 1 character he controls.
shadow: Shadow: Defending player must choose and exhaust 1 character he controls. (2 characters instead if this attack is undefended.)

name: Hummerhorns
text: Forced: After Hummerhorns engages you, deal 5 damage to a single hero you control.
shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to each character the defending player controls. (2 damage instead if this attack is undefended.)

name: Ungoliant's Spawn
text: When Revealed: Each character currently committed to a quest gets -1 [willpower] until the end of the phase.
shadow: Shadow: Raise defending player's threat by 4. (Raise defending player's threat by 8 instead if this attack is undefended.)

name: Great Forest Web
text: Travel: Each player must exhaust 1 hero he controls to travel here.

name: Mountains of Mirkwood
text: Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck and add it to the staging area to travel here.  Response: After Mountains of Mirkwood leaves play as an explored location, each player may search the top 5 cards of his deck for 1 card and add it to his hand. Shuffle the rest of the searched cards back into their owners' decks.

name: Eyes of the Forest
text: When Revealed: Each player discards all event cards in his hand.

name: Caught in a Web
text: When Revealed: The player with the highest threat level attaches this card to one of his heroes. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached hero does not ready during the refresh phase unless you pay 2 resources from that hero's pool.")

name: Wolf Rider
shadow: Shadow: Wolf Rider attacks the defending player. That player may declare 1 character as a defender. Deal Wolf Rider its own Shadow card. After combat, return Wolf Rider to the top of the encounter deck.

name: Hill Troll
text: Excess combat damage dealt by Hill Troll (damage that is dealt beyond the remaining hit points of the character damaged by its attack) must be assigned as an increase to your threat.

name: Goblin Sniper
text: During the encounter phase, players cannot optionally engage Goblin Sniper if there are other enemies in the staging area.  Forced: If Goblin Sniper is in the staging area at the end of the combat phase, each player deals 1 point of damage to 1 character he controls.

name: Marsh Adder
text: Forced: Each time Marsh Adder attacks you, raise your threat by 1.

name: Wargs
text: Forced: If Wargs is dealt a shadow card with no effect, return Wargs to the staging area after it attacks.
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. (+2 [attack] instead if this attack is undefended.)

name: Despair
text: When Revealed: Remove 4 progress tokens from the current quest card. (If there are fewer than 4 progress tokens on the quest, remove all progress tokens from that quest.)
shadow: Shadow: Defending character does not count its [defense].

name: The Brown Lands
text: Forced: After the players travel to The Brown Lands, place 1 progress token on it.

name: The East Bight
text: When faced with the option to travel, the players must travel to The East Bight if there is no active location.

name: Dol Guldur Orcs
text: When Revealed: The first player chooses 1 character currently committed to a quest. Deal 2 damage to that character.
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. (+3 [attack] instead if this attack is undefended.)

name: Chieftan Ufthak
keywords: Chieftain Ufthak get +2Attack for each resource token on him.
text: Forced: After Chieftain Ufthak attacks, place 1 resource token on him.

name: Dol Guldur Beastmaster
text: Forced: When Dol Guldur Beastmaster attacks, deal it 1 additional shadow card.

name: Driven by Shadow
text: When Revealed: Each enemy and each location currently in the staging area gets +1 [threat] until the end of the phase. If there are no cards in the staging area, Driven by Shadow gains surge.
shadow: Shadow: Choose and discard 1 attachment from the defending character. (If this attack is undefended, discard all attachments you control.)

name: The Necromancer's Reach
text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

name: Necromancer's Pass
text: Travel: The first player must discard 2 cards from his hand at random to travel here.

name: Enchanted Stream
text: While Enchanted Stream is the active location, players cannot draw cards.

name: Forest Spider
text: Forced: After Forest Spider engages a player, it gets +1 [attack] until the end of the round.
shadow: Shadow: Defending player must choose and discard 1 attachment he controls.

name: East Bight Patrol
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. (If this attack is undefended, also raise your threat by 3.)

name: Black Forest Bats
text: When Revealed: Each player must choose 1 character currently committed to a quest, and remove that character from the quest. (The chosen character does not ready.)

name: Old Forest Road
text: Response: After you travel to Old Forest Road, the first player may choose and ready 1 character he controls.

name: Forest Gate
text: Response: After you travel to Forest Gate, the first player may draw 2 cards.

name: Dungeon Jailor
text: Forced: If Dungeon Jailor is in the staging area after the players have just quested unsuccessfully, shuffle 1 unclaimed objective card from the staging area back into the encounter deck.

name: Nazgûl of Dol Guldur
keywords: No attachments can be played on Nazgul of Dol Guldur.
text: Forced: When the prisoner is "rescued", move Nazgul of Dol Guldur into the staging area.  Forced: After a shadow effect dealt to Nazgul of Dol Guldur resolves, the engaged player must choose and discard 1 character he controls.

name: Cavern Guardian
shadow: Shadow: Choose and discard 1 attachment you control. Discarded  objective cards are returned to the staging area. (If this attack is  undefended, discard all attachments you control.)

name: Under the Shadow
text: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase, raise the total [threat] in the  staging area by X, where X is the number of players in the game.
shadow: Shadow: Defending player raises his threat by the number of enemies  with which he is engaged.

name: Iron Shackles
text: When Revealed: Attach Iron Shackles to the top of the first player's deck. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "The next time a player would draw 1 or more cards from attached deck, discard Iron Shackles instead.")
shadow: Shadow: Resolve the "When Revealed" effect of Iron Shackles.

name: Tower Gate
text: Forced: After travelling to Tower Gate, each player places the top card of his deck, face down in front of him, as if it just engaged him from the staging area. These cards are called "Orc Guard", and act as enemies with: 1 hit point, 1 [attack], and 1 [defense].

name: Gandalf's Map
text: Action: Raise your threat by 2 to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. When claimed, attach Gandalf's Map to a hero you control. (Counts as an attachment. If detached, return Gandalf's Map to the staging area.)   Attached hero cannot attack or defend.

name: Dungeon Torch
text: Action: Raise your threat by 2 to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. When claimed, attach Dungeon Torch to a hero you control. (Counts as an attachment. If detached, return Dungeon Torch to the staging area.)  Forced: At the end of each round, raise attached hero's controller's threat by 2.

name: Shadow Key
text: Action: Raise your threat by 2 to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. When claimed, attach Shadow Key to a hero you control. (Counts as an attachment. If detached, return Shadow Key to the staging area.)  Forced: At the end of each round, attached hero suffers 1 damage.

name: Misty Mountain Goblins
text: Forced: After Misty Mountain Goblins attacks, remove 1 progress token from the current quest.
shadow: Shadow: Remove 1 progress token from the current quest. (3 progress tokens instead if this attack is undefended.)

name: Massing at Night
text: When Revealed: Reveal X additional cards from the encounter deck. X is the number of players in the game.
shadow: Shadow: Deal X shadow cards to this attacker. X is the number of players in the game.

name: Banks of the Anduin
text: Forced: If Banks of the Anduin leaves play, return it to the top of the encounter deck instead of placing it in the discard pile.

name: Gladden Fields
text: Forced: While Gladden Fields is the active location, each player must raise his threat by an additional point during the refresh phase.

name: Eastern Crows
text: Forced: After Eastern Crows is defeated, shuffle it back into the encounter deck.
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. (+2 [attack] instead if defending player's threat is 35 or higher.)

name: Evil Storm
text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each character controlled by each player with a threat of 35 or higher.

name: Pursued by Shadow
text: When Revealed: Each player raises his threat by 1 for each character he controls that is not currently committed to a quest.
shadow: Shadow: Defending player chooses and returns 1 exhausted ally he controls to its owner's hand. If he controls no exhausted allies, raise his threat by 3.

name: Treacherous Fog
text: When Revealed: Each location in the staging area gets +1 [threat] until the end of the phase. Then, each player with a threat of 35 or higher chooses and discards 1 card from his hand.

name: Flies and Spiders
text: Setup: Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of the Forest Spider and 1 copy of the Old Forest Road, and add them to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

name: A Fork in the Road
text: Forced: When you defeat this stage, proceed to one of the 2 "A Chosen Path" stages, at random.

name: Don't Leave the Path!
text: When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 Spider card of his choice, and add it to the staging area.  The players must find and defeat Ungoliant's Spawn to win this game.

name: Beorn's Path
text: Players cannot defeat this stage while Ungoliant's Spawn is in play. If players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

name: The Necromancer's Tower
text: Setup: Search the encounter deck for the 3 objective cards, reveal and place them in the staging area. Also, place the Nazgul of Dol Guldur face up but out of play, alongside the quest deck. Then, shuffle the encounter deck, and attach 1 encounter to each objective card.

name: The Necromancer's Tower
text: When Revealed: Randomly select 1 hero card (among all the heroes controlled by the players) and turn it facedown. That hero is now considered a "prisoner", cannot be used, cannot be damaged, and does not collect resources, until it is "rescued" (as instructed by card effects) later in this quest.  The players, as a group, cannot play more than 1 ally card each round.  Players cannot advance to the next stage of this quest unless they have at least 1 objective card.

name: Through the Caverns
text: Response: After placing any number of progress tokens on this card, flip the "prisoner" hero card face-up, and place 1 damage token on it. This hero has been "rescued", and may now be used by its controller.  The players, as a group, cannot play more than 1 ally card each round.  Players cannot advance to the next stage of this quest unless they have rescued the prisoner and have all 3 "Escape from Dol Guldur" objective cards.

name: Out of the Dungeons
text: Forced: At the beginning of each quest phase, each player places the top card of his deck, face down in front of him, as if it just engaged him from the staging area. These cards are called "Orc Guard", and act as enemies with: 1 hit point, 1 [attack], and 1 [defense].  Players cannot defeat this stage while Nazgul of Dol Guldur is in play. If this stage is defeated and Nazgul of Dol Guldur is not in play, the players have won the game.

name: To the River...
text: Setup: Each player reveals 1 card from the top of the encounter deck, and adds it to the staging area.

name: To the River...
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck for 1 Hill Troll (if one is not already in play), and place it in the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.  Players cannot defeat this stage while any Hill Troll cards are in play.

name: Anduin Passage
text: Reveal 1 additional card from the encounter deck each quest phase. Do not make engagement checks during the encounter phase. (Each player may still optionally engage 1 enemy each encounter phase.)

name: Ambush on the Shore
text: When Revealed: Reveal 2 encounter cards per player, and add them to the staging area.  Skip the staging step of the quest phase for the remainder of the game.  Once there are no enemies in play, the players have won the game.

name: Bilbo Baggins
text: The first player draws 1 additional card in the resource phase.

name: Dúnedain Mark
text: Attached hero gains +1 [attack].  Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Mark to another hero.

name: Campfire Tales
text: Action: Each player draws 1 card.

name: Winged Guardian
text: Winged Guardian cannot have restricted attachments.  Forced: After an attack in which Winged Guardian defends resolves, pay 1 [tactics] resource or discard Winged Guardian from play.

name: The Eagles Are Coming!
text: Action: Search the top 5 cards of your deck for any number of Eagle cards and add them to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Westfold Horse-Breaker
text: Action: Discard Westfold Horse-Breaker to choose and ready a hero.

name: Mustering the Rohirrim
text: Action: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for any 1 Rohan ally card and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Rivendell Minstrel
text: Response: After you play Rivendell Minstrel from your hand, search your deck for 1 Song card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Strider's Path
text: Response: After a location is revealed from the encounter deck, immediately travel to that location without resolving its Travel effect. If another location is currently active, return it to the staging area.

name: Song of Kings
text: Attached hero gains a [leadership] resource icon.

name: The Hunt Begins
text: Setup: Reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck, and add it to the staging area.

name: The Hunt Begins
text: Forced: After the players quest successfully, the first player looks at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Reveal and add 1 of those cards to the staging area, and discard the other 2 cards.

name: A New Terror Abroad
text: Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, the first player looks at the top 2 cards of the encounter deck. Reveal and add 1 of those cards to the staging area, and discard the other.

name: On the Trail
text: Any player who does not control a hero with at least 1 Clue objective attached cannot commit characters to this quest. If there are ever no heroes with Clue objectives attached in play, reset the quest deck to stage 2B.  If the players defeat this stage, the players have once again found a true sign of Gollum's passing, and won the game.

name: Signs of Gollum
text: Response: After the players quest successfully, the players may claim Signs of Gollum if it has no attached encounters. When claimed, attach Signs of Gollum to any hero committed to the quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with: "Forced: After attached hero is damaged or leaves play, return this card to the top of the encounter deck.")

name: The Old Ford
keywords: X is the number of ally cards in play.
shadow: Shadow: Discard from play all allies with a printed cost lower than the number of Riverland locations in play.

name: The Eaves of Mirkwood
text: While The Eaves of Mirkwood is the active location, encounter card effects cannot be canceled.

name: River Ninglor
text: While River Ninglor is the active location, remove 1 progress token from it and from the current quest at the end of each round.
shadow: Shadow: Remove 1 progress token from the current quest. (2 progress tokens instead if this attack is undefended.)

name: The East Bank
text: While The East Bank is the active location, ally cards cost 1 additional matching resource to play from hand.
shadow: Shadow: If you do not control at least 1 hero with a Clue card attached, return this enemy to the staging area after its attack resolves.

name: The West Bank
text: While The West Bank is the active location, attachment and event cards cost 1 additional matching resource to play from hand.
shadow: Shadow: If you do not control at least 1 hero with a Clue card attached, double this enemy's base [attack] for this attack.

name: Goblintown Scavengers
text: When Revealed: Discard the top card of each player's deck. Until the end of the phase, increase Goblintown Scavenger's [threat] by the total printed cost of all cards discarded in this way.

name: Hunters from Mordor
text: Hunters from Mordor get +2 [attack] and +2 [threat] for each Clue card in play.
shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to each hero with a Clue card attached. (3 damage instead if this attack is undefended.)

name: False Lead
text: When Revealed: The first player chooses and shuffles a card with the printed Clue trait back into the encounter deck. If there are no Clue cards in play, False Lead gains surge.

name: Flooding
text: When Revealed: Remove all progress tokens from all Riverland locations.
shadow: Shadow: Resolve the "when revealed" effect of this card.

name: Old Wives' Tales
text: When Revealed: Discard 1 resource from each hero's resource pool, if able. Exhaust any hero that could not discard a resource from its pool.

name: Frodo Baggins
text: Response: After Frodo Baggins is damaged, cancel the damage and instead raise your threat by the amount of damage he would have been dealt. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Dúnedain Warning
text: Attached hero gains +1 [defense].  Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Warning to another hero.

name: Second Breakfast
text: Action: Each player returns the topmost attachment card from his discard pile to his hand.

name: Beorning Beekeeper
text: Action: Discard Beorning Beekeeper from play to deal 1 damage to each enemy in the staging area.

name: Born Aloft
text: Action: Discard Born Aloft from play to return attached ally to its owner's hand.

name: Éomund
text: Response: After Eomund leaves play, ready all Rohan characters in play.

name: Nor am I a Stranger
text: Attached character gains the Rohan trait.

name: Longbeard Map-Maker
text: Action: Spend 1 [lore] resource to give Longbeard Map-Maker +1 [willpower] until the end of the phase.

name: A Burning Brand
text: While attached character is defending, cancel any shadow effects on cards dealt to the attacking enemy.

name: Song of Wisdom
text: Attached hero gains a [lore] resource icon.

name: Grimbeorn's Quest
text: Setup: Add The Carrock to the staging area. Remove 4 unique Troll cards and 4 copies of the "Sacked!" card from the encounter deck and set them aside, out of play. Then shuffle 1 "Sacked!" card per player back into the encounter deck.

name: Grimbeorn's Quest
text: Forced: After placing the 7th progress token on Grimbeorn's Quest, The Carrock becomes the active location. Discard the previous active location from play.

name: Against the Trolls
text: When Revealed: Place the unique Troll cards previously set aside into the staging area.  Players cannot defeat this stage if there are any Troll enemies in play.

name: Grimbeorn the Old
text: Grimbeorn the Old does not exhaust to defend against Troll enemies.  If Grimbeorn the Old has 8 or more resource tokens on him, he joins the first player as an ally.  Action: Spend 1 [leadership] resource to place that resource on Grimbeorn the Old.

name: Louis
text: While Louis is engaged with a player, all Troll enemies gain, "Forced: After this enemy attacks, the defending player must raise his threat by 3."  Response: After defeating Louis, you may choose and discard 1 "Sacked!" card from play.

name: Morris
text: While Morris is engaged with a player, all Troll enemies get +1 [attack].  Response: After defeating Morris, you may choose and discard 1 "Sacked!" card from play.

name: Stuart
text: While Stuart is engaged with a player, all Troll enemies get +1 [defense].  Response: After defeating Stuart, you may choose and discard 1 "Sacked!" card from play.

name: Rupert
text: Forced: After Rupert attacks, shuffle all copies of the "Sacked!" card from the discard pile back into the encounter deck.  Response: After defeating Rupert, you may choose and discard 1 "Sacked!" card from play.

name: Muck Adder
text: Forced: If Muck Adder damages a character, discard that character from play.
shadow: Shadow: Defending character gets -1 [defense] for the duration of this attack.

name: The Carrock
text: Players cannot travel to The Carrock except through quest card effects.  While The Carrock is the active location, Troll enemies get +1 [attack] and +1 [defense].

name: River Langflood
text: While it is in the staging area, River Langflood gets +1 [threat] for each Troll enemy in play.

name: Bee Pastures
text: Response: After you travel to Bee Pastures, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Grimbeorn the Old and add him to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Oak-wood Grove
text: While Oak-wood Grove is the active location, resource tokens from any sphere may be spent as [leadership] resource tokens.

name: A Frightened Beast
text: When Revealed: Each player raises his threat by the total [threat] of all cards in the staging area. Any player may choose to discard from play 1 Creature ally card he controls to cancel this effect.

name: Sacked!
text: When Revealed: Attach to a hero with no "Sacked!" cards attached controlled by the first player. (Cannot be canceled.) Counts as a condition attachment with the text: "Attached hero cannot attack, defend, commit to a quest, trigger its effect, or collect resources."
shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Troll, resolve this card's "when revealed" effect.

name: Roasted Slowly
text: When Revealed: Destroy all heroes with the card "Sacked!" attached. Then, shuffle Roasted Slowly back into the encounter deck.
shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Troll, remove 2 damage tokens from it.

name: Prince Imrahil
text: Response: After a character leaves play, ready Prince Imrahil. (Limit once per round.)

name: Dúnedain Quest
text: Attached hero gains +1 [willpower].  Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Quest to another hero.

name: Parting Gifts
text: Action: Move any number of resource tokens from a [leadership] hero's resource pool to any other hero's resource pool.

name: Landroval
text: Landroval cannot have restricted attachments.  Response: After a hero card is destroyed, return Landroval to his owner's hand to put that hero back into play, with 1 damage token on it. (Limit once per game.)

name: To the Eyrie
text: Response: After an ally is destroyed, exhaust 1 Eagle character to move that ally from the discard pile to its owner's hand.

name: Escort from Edoras
text: While committed to a quest, Escort from Edoras gets +2 [willpower].  Forced: After resolving a quest to which Escort from Edoras was committed, discard Escort from Edoras from play.

name: Ancient Mathom
text: Response: After attached location is explored, the first player draws 3 cards.

name: Infighting
text: Action: Move any number of damage from one enemy to another.

name: Radagast
text: Radagast collects 1 resource each resource phase. These resources can be used to pay for Creature cards played from your hand.  Action: Spend X resources from Radagast's pool to heal X wounds on any 1 Creature.

name: The Wounded Eagle
text: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Rhosgobel and Wilyador, and add them to the staging area with 2 damage tokens on Wilyador. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Radagast's Request
text: Response: After the quest phase begins, the first player may place X damage tokens on Wilyador to look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Reveal and add 1 of these cards to the staging area, and discard the other 2. X is the number of players in the game.  Forced: After a card effect heals Wilyador, remove that card from the game.

name: Return to Rhosgobel
text: When Revealed: Heal 5 wounds from Wilyador for each Athelas objective card the players control.  If Wilyador is completely healed when this effect resolves, Wilyador survives and the players have won the game. Otherwise, the players have lost the game.

name: Athelas
text: Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective if it has no encounters attached. Then, attach Athelas to that hero.

name: Wilyador
keywords: No attachments. The first player gains control of Wilyador, as an ally.
text: Forced: At the end of each round, Wilyador suffers 2 damage. Wilyador cannot be healed of more than 5 wounds by a single effect. If Wilyador leaves play, the players have lost the game.

name: Rhosgobel
keywords: X is the number of players in the game.
text: While Rhosgobel is in the staging area, Wilyador cannot be healed.  Travel: Players must complete stage one of this quest before they can travel to Rhosgobel.

name: Forest Grove
text: Response: After the players explore Forest Grove, search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 Athelas objective, and add it to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Exhaustion
text: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to each exhausted character.
shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

name: Swarming Insects
text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each character without any attachments.
shadow: Shadow: If a character (including Wilyador) has more damage than each other character, deal 3 additional damage to that character.

name: Festering Wounds
text: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to each wounded character.
shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to each wounded character. (2 damage instead if this attack is undefended.)

name: Mirkwood Flock
text: Only Eagle characters or characters with ranged can attack or defend against Mirkwood Flock.
shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, the damage must be placed on Wilyador.

name: Black Forest Bats
text: Only Eagle characters or characters with ranged can attack or defend against Black Forest Bats.
shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, the damage must be placed on Wilyador.

name: Brand son of Bain
text: Response: After Brand son of Bain attacks and defeats an enemy engaged with another player, choose and ready one of that player's characters.

name: Keen-eyed Took
text: Response: After Keen-eyed Took enters play, reveal the top card of each player's deck.  Action: Return Keen-eyed Took to your hand to discard the top card of each player's deck.

name: Rear Guard
text: Quest Action: Discard a [leadership] ally to give each hero committed to this quest +1 [willpower] until the end of the phase.

name: Descendant of Thorondor
text: Descendant of Thorondor cannot have restricted attachments.  Response: After Descendant of Thorondor enters or leaves play, deal 2 damage to any 1 enemy in the staging area.

name: Meneldor's Flight
text: Action: Choose an Eagle ally. Return that character to its owner's hand.

name: The Riddermark's Finest
text: Action: Exhaust and discard The Riddermark's Finest to place 2 progress tokens on any location.

name: Ride to Ruin
text: Action: Discard a Rohan ally to choose a location. Place 3 progress tokens on that location.

name: Gildor Inglorion
text: Action: Exhaust Gildor Inglorion to look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Switch one of those cards with a card from your hand. Then, return the 3 cards to the top of your deck, in any order.

name: Gildor's Counsel
text: Play during the Quest phase, before characters are committed to the Quest.  Action: Reveal 1 less card from the encounter deck this phase. (To a minimum of 1.)

name: Song of Travel
text: Attached hero gains a [spirit] resource icon.

name: The Hills of Emyn Muil
text: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Amon Hen and Amon Lhaw, and add them to the staging area. Then shuffle the encounter deck.

name: The Hills of Emyn Muil
text: Forced: If there are no location cards in the staging area, the first treachery card revealed during the quest phase gains surge.  Players cannot defeat this stage unless there are no Emyn Muil locations in play, and they have collected at least 20 victory points.

name: Amon Hen
keywords: X is double the number of players in the game.
text: While Amon Hen is the active location, players cannot play events.

name: Amon Lhaw
keywords: X is double the number of players in the game.
text: While Amon Lhaw is the active location, treat all attachments as if their printed text boxes were blank.

name: The East Wall of Rohan
text: While The East Wall of Rohan is the active location, non-Rohan characters cost 2 additional matching resources to play.

name: The North Stair
text: Forced: After traveling to The North Stair, move the top card of the encounter discard pile to the staging area. Resolve any "when revealed" effects on that card.

name: Rauros Falls
text: While Rauros Falls is the active location, all characters must commit to the current quest during the quest phase.
shadow: Shadow: After this attack resolves, return attacking enemy to the staging area.

name: The Shores of Nen Hithoel
text: Travel: The first player must discard 1 event card from his hand to travel to this location.
shadow: Shadow: After this attack resolves, return attacking enemy to the staging area.

name: The Outer Ridge
text: While The Outer Ridge is the active location, each location in the staging area gets +1 [threat].
shadow: Shadow: After this attack resolves, return attacking enemy to the staging area.

name: The Highlands
text: Travel: In order to travel to The Highlands, the players must reveal the top card of the encounter deck, and add it to the staging area.

name: Impassable Chasm
text: When Revealed: If there is an active location, remove all progress tokens from that location and return it to the staging area. If no location is moved by this effect, this card gains surge.

name: Rockslide
text: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to each character committed to this quest.
shadow: Shadow: Remove defending character from combat. This attack is considered undefended.

name: Slick Footing
text: When Revealed: Remove 1 progress token from each location in play. Then, discard the top card of each player's deck for each progress token removed by this effect.

name: Orc Horse Thieves
text: Orc Horse Thieves get +1 [attack] for each location in the staging area.

name: Boromir
text: Action: Raise your threat by 1 to ready Boromir.  Action: Discard Boromir to deal 2 damage to each enemy engaged with a single player.

name: Dúnedain Watcher
text: Response: Discard Dunedain Watcher from play to cancel the shadow effects of a card just triggered.

name: Dúnedain Cache
text: Attached hero gains ranged.  Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Cache to another hero.

name: Vassal of the Windlord
text: Vassal of the Windlord cannot have restricted attachments.  Forced: After an attack in which Vassal of the Windlord attacked resolves, discard Vassal of the Windlord from play.

name: Song of Mocking
text: Action: Exhaust Song of Mocking to choose another hero. Until the end of the phase, attached hero takes all damage assigned to the chosen hero.

name: Elfhelm
text: While Elfhelm is ready, he gains: "Response: After your threat is raised as the result of questing unsuccessfully, or by an encounter or quest card effect, reduce your threat by 1."

name: We Do Not Sleep
text: Action: Until the end of the phase, Rohan characters do not exhaust to commit to quests.

name: Silvan Tracker
text: Response: After a Silvan character readies during the refresh phase, heal 1 damage from that character.

name: Fast Hitch
text: Action: Exhaust Fast Hitch to ready attached character.

name: Song of Battle
text: Attached hero gains a [tactics] resource icon.

name: Into the Marshes
text: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Gollum, and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck, then reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

name: The Capture
text: Forced: After this stage is defeated, the first player chooses a player. That player must pass an Escape test, dealing 1 card from the encounter deck for each resource token on Gollum, to capture him. If Gollum is not captured at this time, reset the quest deck to stage 1B.  If this final Escape test is passed, the players have captured Gollum and won the game.

name: Gollum
text: If Gollum ever has 8 or more resource tokens on him, shuffle him back into the encounter deck.  Forced: At the end of the quest phase, the party must make an escape test, dealing 1 card per player from the encounter deck. If this test is failed, place 2 resource tokens on Gollum.

name: A Wisp of Pale Sheen
text: When Revealed: Place 2 resource tokens on Gollum. Any player may exhaust a [lore] hero to reduce this effect to 1 resource token.  Escape: 4

name: Nightfall
text: When Revealed: The first player makes an escape test, dealing 2 cards from the encounter deck. If this test is failed, place 1 resource token on Gollum and raise each player's threat by 2.  Escape: 2

name: Through the Mist
text: When Revealed: The first player makes an escape test counting [attack] instead of [willpower], dealing 2 cards from the encounter deck. If this test is failed, place 1 resource token on Gollum and raise each player's threat by 1.  Escape: 3

name: The Lights of the Dead
text: When Revealed: Each player must make an escape test, dealing 2 cards from the encounter deck for each test. Each player that fails this test places 1 resource token on Gollum, and raises his threat by 1.  Escape: 5

name: Giant Marsh Worm
text: Forced: Remove 2 damage from Giant Marsh Worm at the end of each round.  Escape: 2

name: Impassable Bog
text: When Revealed: Place 1 resource token on Gollum for each location card in the staging area.  Escape: 2

name: The Heart of the Marshes
text: While The Heart of the Marshes is the active location, all cards dealt from the encounter deck for escape tests get +1 Escape. (Cards receive this bonus even if they do not have a printed escape value.)  Escape: 1

name: Fens and Mires
text: Forced: After the players travel to this location, place 1 resource token on Gollum.  Escape: 2

name: Dáin Ironfoot
text: While Dain Ironfoot is ready, Dwarf characters get +1 [attack] and +1 [willpower].

name: Dúnedain Signal
text: Attached hero gains sentinel.  Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Signal to another hero.

name: Dawn Take You All
text: Play after shadow cards have been dealt, before any attacks have resolved.  Combat Action: Each player may choose and discard 1 facedown shadow card from an enemy with which he is engaged.

name: Eagles of the Misty Mountains
text: Eagles of the Misty Mountains cannot have restricted attachments. Eagles of the Misty Mountains gets +1 [attack] and +1 [defense] for each facedown attachment it has.  Response: After another Eagle character leaves play, you may attach that card facedown to Eagles of the Misty Mountains.

name: Support of the Eagles
text: Action: Exhaust Support of the Eagles to choose an Eagle ally. Until the end of the phase, attached hero adds that ally's [attack] or [defense] (choose 1) to its own.

name: West Road Traveller
text: Response: After you play West Road Traveller from your hand, switch the active location with any other location in the staging area.

name: Astonishing Speed
text: Action: Until the end of the phase, all Rohan characters get +2 [willpower].

name: Mirkwood Runner
text: While Mirkwood Runner is attacking alone, the defending enemy does not count its [defense].

name: Rumour from the Earth
text: Action: Look at the top card of the encounter deck. Then, you may pay 1 [lore] resource to return Rumour from the Earth to your hand.

name: Shadow of the Past
text: Action: Move the top card of the encounter discard pile to the top of the encounter deck.

name: Through the Forest
text: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Gollum. Choose a player to guard Gollum at the start of the game, and place Gollum in front of that player. Then shuffle the encounter deck. Reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck, and add it to the staging area.

name: Escape Attempt
text: The player guarding Gollum cannot commit characters to this quest (unless he is the only player remaining in the game).  If the players quest unsuccessfully, Gollum escapes and the players have lost the game.

name: To the Elvin King's Halls
text: The player guarding Gollum cannot play cards from his hand.

name: Ambush
text: Forced: At the beginning of the combat phase, all enemies in play engage the player guarding Gollum.  Players cannot defeat this stage if there are any enemies in play. If players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

name: Gollum
text: Damage from undefended attacks against you must be dealt to Gollum. If Gollum is destroyed, or if the player guarding Gollum is eliminated, the players have lost the game.  Forced: At the end of each round, raise the threat of the player guarding Gollum by 3. Then, that player may choose a new player to guard Gollum.

name: The Spider's Ring
text: While The Spider's Ring is the active location, the player guarding Gollum cannot change.
shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, return any current active location to the staging area. The Spider's Ring becomes the active location.

name: Dry Watercourse
text: While Dry Watercourse is the active location, all treachery card effects that target the player guarding Gollum also target each other player.

name: Woodman's Glade
text: Travel: The player guarding Gollum must exhaust a hero he controls to travel to Woodman's Glade.  Response: After exploring Woodman's Glade, reduce the threat of each player not guarding Gollum by 2.

name: Wood Elf Path
text: Response: After the players travel to Wood Elf Path, the player guarding Gollum may choose a new player to guard him.

name: Gollum's Anguish
text: When Revealed: Raise the threat of the player guarding Gollum by 8. That player must choose a new player to guard Gollum, if able.
shadow: Shadow: Raise the threat of the player guarding Gollum by 4.

name: Gollum's Bite
text: When Revealed: Deal 4 damage to a hero controlled by the player guarding Gollum. That player must choose a new player to guard Gollum, if able.
shadow: Shadow: Deal 2 damage to a hero controlled by the player guarding Gollum.

name: Wasted Provisions
text: When Revealed: Discard the top 10 cards from the deck of the player guarding Gollum. That player must choose a new player to guard Gollum, if able.
shadow: Shadow: Discard the top 5 cards from the deck of the player guarding Gollum.

name: Mirkwood Bats
text: Forced: After Mirkwood Bats engages a player, deal 1 damage to each character controlled by the player guarding Gollum.

name: Attercop, Attercop
text: Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, Attercop, Attercop automatically engages the player guarding Gollum, regardless of his threat.

name: Dwalin
text: Response: After Dwalin attacks and destroys an Orc enemy, lower your threat by 2.

name: Bifur
text: Action: Pay 1 resource from a hero's resource pool to add 1 resource to Bifur's resource pool. Any player may trigger this ability. (Limit once per round.)

name: Narvi's Belt
text: Action: Exhaust Narvi's Belt to give attached hero a [leadership], [lore], [tactics], or [spirit] icon until the end of the phase.

name: Durin's Song
text: Action: Choose a Dwarf hero. That hero gets +2 [willpower], +2 [attack], and +2 [defense] until the end of the round.

name: Ever Onward
text: Response: After players quest unsuccessfully, choose a player. That player does not raise his threat.

name: Veteran of Nanduhirion
text: Veteran of Nanduhirion enters play with 1 damage on it.

name: Dwarrowdelf Axe
keywords: Attach to a Dwarf character. Restricted.
text: Attached character gets +1 [attack].  Response: After attached character attacks, deal 1 damage to the defending enemy.

name: Khazâd! Khazâd!
text: Action: Choose a Dwarf character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 [attack].

name: Zigil Miner
text: Action: Exhaust Zigil Miner and name a number to discard the top 2 cards of your deck. If at least one of those cards has cost equal to the named number, choose a hero you control. For each card that matches the named number, add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.

name: Untroubled by Darkness
text: Action: Each Dwarf character gets +1 [willpower] until the end of the phase. (+2 [willpower] instead if the active location is an Underground or Dark location.)

name: Erebor Record Keeper
text: Erebor Record Keeper cannot attack or defend.  Action: Exhaust Erebor Record Keeper and pay 1 [lore] resource to choose and ready a Dwarf character.

name: Ancestral Knowledge
text: Action: Exhaust a Dwarf character to place 2 progress tokens on the active location. (4 progress tokens instead if it is an Underground or Mountain location.)

name: Boots from Erebor
keywords: Attach to a Dwarf or Hobbit character.
text: Limit 1 Boots from Erebor per character.  Attached character gets +1 hit point.

name: Patrol Leader
text: Forced: Before Patrol Leader is dealt damage, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If the discarded card is an enemy, cancel that damage.
shadow: Shadow: Cancel all damage dealt to this enemy.

name: Signs of Conflict
shadow: Shadow: Defending player raises his threat by 2.

name: East-gate
text: Players cannot optionally engage enemies and no engagement checks are made.  Forced: After East-gate leaves play as an explored location, add First Hall to the staging area.

name: First Hall
text: Travel: Each player must raise his threat by 3 to travel here.  Forced: After First Hall leaves play as an explored location, add Bridge of Khazad-dum to the staging area.

name: Bridge of Khazad-dûm
text: While Bridge of Khazad-dum is the active location, players cannot play cards.

name: Stairs of Náin
text: Travel: The first player must exhaust 1 character he controls to travel here.
shadow: Shadow: Defending player must choose and exhaust 1 character he controls.

name: Cave-troll
text: For each excess point of combat damage dealt by Cave-troll (damage that is dealt beyond the remaining hit points of the character damaged by its attack) you must damage another character you control.

name: Orc Horn Blower
text: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

name: Hidden Threat
text: When Revealed: Each player must raise his threat by 1 for each enemy in the staging area. Then, the last player discards an attachment he controls.

name: Book of Mazarbul
text: Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective. Then, attach Book of Mazarbul to that hero. (If detached, return Book of Mazarbul to the staging area.)  Attached hero cannot attack and does not exhaust to commit to a quest.

name: The Nameless Fear
text: The Nameless Fear cannot engage or be engaged.  X is the number of victory points in the victory display.

name: New Devilry
text: When Revealed: If the players are not on stage 1, shuffle the current quest card into the quest deck, then reveal a new quest card. Otherwise, New Devilry gains surge.
shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, raise your threat by The Nameless Fear's [threat].

name: Shadow of Fear
text: When Revealed: The first player attaches Shadow of Fear to one of his heroes. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero cannot exhaust or ready and its text box is treated as if it were blank. Action: Pay 3 resources from attached hero's pool to discard this card.")

name: A Foe Beyond
text: When Revealed: The last player deals damage equal to The Nameless Fear's attack to a hero he controls. This effect cannot be canceled.
shadow: Shadow: Deal damage equal to The Nameless Fear's [attack] to the defending character.

name: Abandoned Tools
text: Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective if it has no encounters attached. Then, attach Abandoned Tools to that hero. (If detached, return Abandoned Tools to the staging area.)

name: Chieftain of the Pit
text: When Revealed: Chieftain of the Pit gets +3 [attack] until the end of the round.
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy attacks again after this attack. Deal it another shadow card for the next attack.

name: Goblin Spearman
text: Goblin Spearman gets +2 [attack] if its attack is undefended.
shadow: Shadow: Add Goblin Spearman to the staging area.

name: Goblin Archer
keywords: Players cannot optionally engage Goblin Archer.
text: Characters with ranged are eligible to attack Goblin Archer while it is in the staging area.  Forced: After an enemy is revealed from the encounter deck, the first player must deal 1 damage to 1 character he controls.

name: Undisturbed Bones
text: When Revealed: Each player must deal X damage to 1 ally he controls. X is the number of allies he controls.
shadow: Shadow: If the defending character is an ally, discard it from play.

name: Plundered Armoury
text: While Plundered Armoury is in the staging area, enemies get +1 [attack].  Response: After Plundered Armoury leaves play as an explored location, each player may attach a Weapon or Armour attachment from his hand to 1 character he controls.

name: Goblin Follower
text: When Revealed: Goblin Follower engages the last player.
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. (+2 [attack] instead if attacking the last player.)

name: Branching Paths
text: While Branching Paths is in the staging area, each Dark location gets +1 [threat].  Forced: After Branching Paths leaves play as an explored location, look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Players must choose 1 of those to reveal and add to the staging area, moving the other 2 to the bottom of the deck.

name: Lightless Passage
text: Travel: Players must exhaust a Cave Torch to travel here.
shadow: Shadow: Cancel all combat damage dealt to attacking enemy.

name: Zigil Mineshaft
text: Action: Raise each player's threat by 1 to place 1 progress token on Zigil Mineshaft.

name: Many Roads
text: When Revealed: Shuffle all locations in the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

name: Burning Low
text: When Revealed: Each enemy and location currently in the staging area gets +1 [threat] until the end of the phase. (+3 [threat] instead if it is a Dark location.) Players may exhaust a Cave Torch to cancel this effect.
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +2 [attack].

name: Cave Torch
text: Action: Exhaust Cave Torch to place up to 3 progress tokens on a Dark location.  Forced: After Cave Torch exhausts, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is an enemy, add it to the staging area.

name: Great Cave-troll
text: No attachments can be played on Great Cave-troll.

name: Orc Drummer
text: While Orc Drummer is in the staging area, each enemy gets +X [threat]. X is the number of players in the game.

name: Stray Goblin
text: X is the number of players in the game.
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +X [attack]. X is the number of players in the game.

name: Chance Encounter
text: When Revealed: Put the top enemy in the encounter discard pile into play, engaged with the first player. If this effect put no enemies into play, Chance Encounter gains surge.
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. (+3 [attack] instead if engaged with the first player.)

name: Massing in the Deep
text: When Revealed: Reveal X additional cards from the encounter deck and add them to the staging area. X is the number of players in the game.
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +X [attack]. X is the number of players in the game.

name: The Mountains' Roots
text: X is the number of players in the game.
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +X [attack]. X is the number of players in the game.

name: Cave In
text: When Revealed: Remove all progress tokens from the current quest card and active location. If Cave In removed no progress tokens, it gains surge.

name: Crumbling Ruin
text: When Revealed: Each player must exhaust a character and discard the top card of his deck, if able. If the printed cost of the discarded card is equal to or higher than the remaining hit points of the exhausted character, discard the exhausted character.

name: Dark and Dreadful
text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character. (2 damage instead if the active location is a Dark location.)
shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character. (Attacking enemy gets +2 [attack] instead if this attack is undefended.)

name: Sudden Pitfall
text: When Revealed: The first player must discard 1 questing character he controls, if able. This effect cannot be canceled.
shadow: Shadow: Discard the defending character from play.

name: Dreadful Gap
text: When Revealed: Immediately travel to Dreadful Gap. If another location is currently active, return it to the staging area.  X is the number of characters in play.

name: Fouled Well
text: When Revealed: Each player may choose and discard 1 card at random from his hand. If all players did not discard 1 card, Fouled Well gains surge.

name: Black Uruks
text: When Revealed: The first player must choose and discard an attachment from a questing character, if able.
shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, deal 2 additional shadow cards to attacking enemy.

name: Mountain Warg
text: If Mountain Warg is dealt a shadow card with no effect, return Mountain Warg to the staging area after it attacks.
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. (+2 [attack] instead if a Mountain is the active location.)

name: Bitter Wind
text: When Revealed: The first player must discard 3 resources from each hero he controls.
shadow: Shadow: Defending player must discard 2 resources from each hero he controls.

name: Knees of the Mountain
text: While Knees of the Mountain is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After an enemy engages a player, it gets +1 [attack] until the end of the round."

name: Turbulent Waters
text: While Turbulent Waters is the active location, players cannot optionally engage enemies.

name: Warg Lair
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 copy of Mountain Warg and add it to the staging area, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.  Response: After Warg Lair leaves play as an explored location, each player draws 1 card.

name: Goblin Scout
text: Each player with a threat of 25 or higher cannot optionally engage Goblin Scout.

name: Goblin Swordsman
text: Goblin Swordsman gets +2 [attack] if its attack is undefended.
shadow: Shadow: Add Goblin Swordsman to the staging area.

name: Watchful Eyes
text: When Revealed: The first player attaches Watchful Eyes to one of his heroes. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Forced: If attached hero is exhausted at the end of the combat phase, reveal 1 card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.")

name: Goblin Tunnels
text: While Goblin Tunnels is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After a Goblin is revealed from the encounter deck, remove a progress token from the current quest card."
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. (+3 [attack] instead if attacking enemy is a Goblin.)

name: Goblin Patrol
text: When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 enemy of his choice, and add it to the staging area. One choice must be Patrol Leader, if able.  Forced: After an enemy is revealed from the encounter deck, discard it instead of adding it to the staging area.  If there are no enemies in play, immediately advance to the next stage of the scenario. (Players can also advance by placing 11 progress tokens on Goblin Patrol.)

name: Search for an Exit
text: While Search for an Exit is the active quest card, only flip it to side 2B at the beginning of the staging step.

name: A Wrong Turn
text: When Revealed: Reveal 1 encounter card per player, and add it to the staging area.  Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

name: Entering the Mines
text: Setup: Search the encounter deck for East-gate and Cave Torch. Put East-gate into play as the active location, and have the first player attach Cave Torch to a hero of his choice. Set First Hall and Bridge of Khazad-dum aside, out of play. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Entering the Mines
text: When Revealed: Reveal 1 encounter card per player, and add it to the staging area.  Players cannot advance to the next stage of the scenario unless Bridge of Khazad-dum is in their victory display.

name: Search for the Chamber
text: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Book of Mazarbul, and have the first player attach it to a hero of his choice. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Search for the Chamber
text: When Revealed: Reveal 1 encounter card per player, and add it to the staging area.

name: The Fate of Balin
text: When Revealed: Remove Book of Mazarbul from the game.  Forced: At the end of the staging step, reveal the top X cards of the encounter deck, adding all enemies to the staging area. Discard the other revealed cards without resolving them. X is the number of players.  If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

name: A Way Up
text: Heroes do not collect resources during the resource phase.  If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

name: Search for an Exit
text: While Search for an Exit is the active quest card, only flip it to side 2B at the beginning of the staging step.

name: Blocked by Shadow
text: When Revealed: The first player chooses 1 of the following: * Each player discards 1 card from the top of the encounter deck. If the card is a treachery card, the discarding player is eliminated from the game. * Reveals the next quest card, putting Blocked by Shadow on the bottom of the quest deck.  Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase. If the players defeat this stage, they escape and win the game.

name: Search for an Exit
text: While Search for an Exit is the active quest card, only flip it to side 2B at the beginning of the staging step.

name: Escape from Darkness
text: Abandoned Tools gains: "Refresh Action: Exhaust attached hero to put a progress token on Escape from Darkness."  Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.  Progress tokens cannot be placed on Escape from Darkness except by Abandoned Tools. If the players defeat this stage, they escape and win the game.

name: A Presence in the Dark
text: Setup: Prepare the quest deck. Add The Nameless Fear to the staging area. Remove all copies of A Foe Beyond from the encounter deck. Then, shuffle 1 copy of A Foe Beyond per player back into the encounter deck.

name: A Presence in the Dark
text: When Revealed: Reveal 1 encounter card per player, and add it to the staging area. Then, add A Presence in the Dark to your victory display.

name: Search for an Exit
text: While Search for an Exit is the active quest card, only flip it to side 2B at the beginning of the staging step.

name: Narrow Paths
text: When Revealed: Each player chooses 1 questing character he controls. Each questing character not chosen does not count its [willpower] until the end of the turn.  Forced: After placing the 1st progress token on Narrow Paths, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Abandoned Tools and add it to the staging area, if able.  Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

name: Search for an Exit
text: While Search for an Exit is the active quest card, only flip it to side 2B at the beginning of the staging step.

name: Heading Up
text: Forced: If Heading Down is in the player's victory display at the end of any quest phase, shuffle Heading Down back into the quest deck.  Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

name: Search for an Exit
text: While Search for an Exit is the active quest card, only flip it to side 2B at the beginning of the staging step.

name: Hasty Council
text: When Revealed: Shuffle all copies of A Foe Beyond from the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck. Reveal the top 2 cards of the quest deck. Choose 1 to become the active quest (flipped to side 2B) and put the other on the bottom of the quest deck. Then, add Hasty Council to your victory display.

name: Search for an Exit
text: While Search for an Exit is the active quest card, only flip it to side 2B at the beginning of the staging step.

name: Heading Down
text: Forced: If Heading Up is in the player's victory display at the end of any quest phase, shuffle Heading Up back into the quest deck.  Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

name: Elrohir
text: While Elladan is in play, Elrohir gets +2 [defense].  Response: After Elrohir is declared as a defender, pay 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.

name: Taking Initiative
text: Action: Discard the top card of your deck. If the discarded card's printed cost is equal to or higher than the number of characters you control, draw 2 cards and deal 2 damage to any enemy.

name: Timely Aid
text: Action: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck and put 1 revealed ally into play, if able. Shuffle all other revealed cards back into your deck.

name: Unseen Strike
text: Action: Choose a character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 [attack] while attacking an enemy with a higher engagement cost than your threat.

name: Keeping Count
keywords: Attach to a hero. Limit 1 per hero.
text: Attached hero gets +1 [attack] for each resource token on another copy of Keeping Count that is above the current number of resource tokens on this card.  Forced: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy, place 1 resource token on this card.

name: Bofur
text: Quest Action: Spend 1 [spirit] resource to put Bofur into play from your hand, exhausted and committed to a quest. If you quest successfully this phase and Bofur is still in play, return him to your hand.

name: Renewed Friendship
text: Response: After another player plays an attachment on a hero you control, you may (choose 1): ready 1 of that player's heroes, have that player draw 1 card, or lower that player's threat by 2.

name: Ravenhill Scout
text: Action: Exhaust Ravenhill Scout to move up to 2 progress tokens from 1 location to another location.

name: Needful to Know
text: Action: Raise your threat by 1 to look at the top card of the ecnounter deck. Then, reduce your threat by X, where X is the threat of that card.

name: Good Meal
text: Action: Discard Good Meal to lower the cost of the next event you play this round that matches attached hero's sphere by 2.

name: Up the Pass
text: Setup: Add Caradhras to the staging area. Remove all copies of Snowstorm from the encounter deck and set them aside, out of play. Put Arwen Undomiel into play under the control of the first player.

name: Up the Pass
text: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player, and add it to the staging area.

name: Snowdrifts
text: When Revealed: Shuffle 1 more copy of Snowstorm into the encounter deck than the number of players in the game.  Forced: After placing the 11th progress token on Snowdrifts, discard any active location. Caradhras becomes the active location.

name: The Mountains' Peaks
text: When Revealed: Shuffle all copies of Snowstorm in the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.  Characters are discarded from play if their [willpower] is ever 0.  Players cannot defeat this stage unless they have 5 victory points. If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

name: Arwen Undómiel
text: The first player gains control of Arwen Undomiel, as an ally.  Response: After Arwen Undomiel exhausts, choose a hero. Add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.  If Arwen Undomiel leaves play, the players are defeated.

name: Caradhras
text: While Caradhras is the active location, questing characters get -1 [willpower].  Players cannot travel to Caradhras except by quest card effects.

name: Fanuidhol
text: While Fanuidhol is the active loction, heroes must spend 1 resource from their resource pool to count their [willpower] during the quest phase.

name: Celebdil
text: While Celebdil is the active location, remove 2 progress tokens from it at the end of each round.

name: The Dimrill Stair
text: Travel: Reshuffle all locations in the discard pile and victory display back into the encounter deck. If you reshuffled at least two locations, reduce each player's threat by 11 and discard all copies of Freezing Cold from play.

name: Rocky Crags
text: Travel: Each player must deal 2 damage to 1 character he controls to travel here.
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 [attack] for each progress token on the active location.

name: Fell Voices
text: When Revealed: Return the top 2 Snow cards in the encounter discard pile to the top of the encounter deck. If this effect returned less than 2 Snow treachery cards, Fell Voices gains surge.

name: Fallen Stones
text: When Revealed: The first player (choose 1): removes all progress tokens from play, or reveals 2 cards from the encounter deck and adds them to the staging area.
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 [attack] for each progress token on the active location.

name: Snowstorm
text: When Revealed: Each questing character gets -1 [willpower] until the end of the phase.
shadow: Shadow: Until the end of the phase, characters defending this attack get -1 [willpower] and are discarded if their [willpower] is 0.

name: Freezing Cold
text: When Revealed: The first player attaches this card to a hero he controls. Counts as a Condition Attachment with the text: "Attached hero gets -2 [willpower] and cannot commit to a quest. If attached hero has more than 1 copy of Freezing Cold attached, discard attached hero from play."

name: Avalanche!
text: When Revealed: Exhaust each ready character and if it is the quest phase commit them to the quest.

name: Mountain Goblin
text: Mountain Goblin gets +1 [attack] for each Mountain location in the staging area.
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. (+2 [attack] instead if the active location is a Mountain.)

name: Mountain Troll
text: Mountain Troll gets +1 [attack] for each Mountain location in the staging area.
shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. (+2 [attack] instead if the active location is a Mountain.)

name: Snow Warg
text: Allies cannot defend while Snow Warg is attacking.  Forced: After a character is declared as a defender against Snow Warg, deal 1 damage to the defending character, if able.

name: Elladan
text: While Elrohir is in play, Elladan gets +2 [attack].  Response: After Elladan is declared as an attacker, pay 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.

name: Lure of Moria
text: Action: Ready all Dwarf characters.

name: Rivendell Blade
keywords: Attach to a Noldor or Silvan character. Restricted.
text: When attached character attacks an enemy, that enemy gets -2 [defense] until the end of the phase.

name: Hail of Stones
text: Action: Exhaust X characters to deal X damage to an enemy in the staging area.

name: Rider of the Mark
text: Action: Spend 1 [spirit] resource to give control of Rider of the Mark to another player. (Limit once per round.)  Response: After Rider of the Mark changes control, discard a shadow card dealt to an enemy you are engaged with.

name: Song of Eärendil
text: Response: After Song of Earendil enters play, draw 1 card.  Response: After another player raises his threat, raise your threat by 1 to reduce that player's threat by 1.

name: Bombur
text: Action: Exhaust Bombur to choose a location. That location gets -1 [threat] until the end of the phase. (That location does not contribute its [threat] instead if it is an Underground location.)

name: Out of the Wild
text: Action: Search the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for any 1 non-objective card worth no victory points and add it to your victory display. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: The End Comes
text: Response: After a Dwarf character leaves play, shuffle the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

name: Along the Misty Mountains
text: Setup: Put Arwen Undomiel into play under the control of the first player. Shuffle the encounter deck. Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player, and add them to the staging area.

name: Orc Outpost
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for Goblin Gate and add it to the staging area, if able. Then, if there is no active location, Goblin Gate becomes the active location.

name: Approaching Rivendell
text: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player, and add it to the staging area.  Characters cannot be healed.  If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

name: Arwen Undómiel
text: The first player gains control of Arwen Undomiel, as an ally.  Response: After Arwen Undomiel exhausts, choose a hero. Add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.  If Arwen Undomiel leaves play, the players are defeated.

name: Ruined Road
text: Response: After you travel to Ruined Road, the first player places 2 progress tokens on it or readies 1 hero he controls.
shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after it attacks.

name: Goblin Gate
text: While Goblin Gate is the active location, the first enemy revealed from the encounter deck each round gains ambush. If that enemy engages a player, it makes an immediate attack (deal and resolve a shadow card).

name: Pathless Country
text: Forced: After at least 1 progress token is placed on Pathless Country, remove 1 progress token from it.
shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to each ally in play.

name: Barren Hills
text: While Barren Hills is the active location, ignore ambush.
shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after it attacks.

name: Sleeping Sentry
text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character. Then, exhaust all ready characters.
shadow: Shadow: Defending player must discard all exhausted characters he controls.

name: Followed by Night
text: When Revealed: The first player (choose 1): deals 1 damage to all allies in play and Followed by Night gains surge, or all enemies engaged with players make an immediate attack, if able.
shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after it attacks.

name: Orc Ambush
text: When Revealed: All Orc enemies in the staging area engage the first player. If there are no Orc enemies in the staging area, return all Orc enemies in the encounter discard pile to the staging area, if able.

name: Goblin Taskmaster
text: Forced: After Goblin Taskmaster engages a player, that player deals 2 damage to 1 character he controls.

name: Orc Raiders
text: Forced: After Orc Raiders engages a player, that player discards 2 attachments he controls, if able.

name: Crebain
text: While Crebain is in the staging area, encounter card effects cannot be canceled.
shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after it attacks.

name: Wild Bear
text: Forced: After Wild Bear engages a player, it makes an immediate attack.

name: Aragorn
text: Refresh Action: Reduce your threat to your starting threat level. (Limit once per game.)

name: Grave Cairn
text: Response: After a character leaves play, add its [attack] to another character's [attack] until the end of the round.

name: Sword that was Broken
text: Attached hero gains a [leadership] resource icon.  If attached hero is Aragorn, each character you control gets +1 [willpower].

name: Watcher of the Bruinen
text: Watcher of the Bruinen does not exhaust to defend.  Forced: After Watcher of the Bruinen defends, either discard it from play or discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Rivendell Bow
text: Attach to a Noldor or Silvan character, or to Aragorn. Limit 1 per character.  Attached character gains ranged.  If attached character has a printed ranged keyword, it gets +1 [attack] during a ranged attack.

name: Arwen Undómiel
text: Response: After Arwen Undomiel exhausts, choose a character. That character gains sentinel and gets +1 [defense] until the end of the round.

name: Elrond's Counsel
text: Action: If you control a unique Noldor character, give another character +1 [willpower] until the end of the phase and lower your threat by 3.

name: Short Cut
text: Response: After a location enters play, exhaust a Hobbit character to shuffle that location back into the encounter deck. Then, reveal 1 card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

name: Legacy of Durin
text: Response: After you play a Dwarf character from your hand, draw 1 card.

name: Resourceful
text: Attach to a hero you control.  Attached hero collects 1 additional resource during the resource phase each round.

name: To the West-door
text: Setup: Remove The Watcher and Doors of Durin from the encounter deck and set them aside, out of play.

name: To the West-door
text: When Revealed: Reveal cards from the encounter deck and add them to the staging area until there is at least X [threat] in the staging area. X is twice the number of players in the game.

name: The Seething Lake
text: When Revealed: Add The Watcher to the staging area. Doors of Durin becomes the active location, moving any previous active location to the staging area. Shuffle all Tentacle cards in the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.  If the players have at least 3 victory points and defeat this stage, they have won the game.

name: Doors of Durin
text: Progress tokens that would be placed on Doors of Durin are instead placed on the current quest card.  Action: Each player may discard any number of cards from his hand. Then, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If the first letter of the encounter card's title matches that of one of the discarded player cards, add Doors of Durin to your victory display. (Limit once per round.)

name: Stair Falls
text: Travel: The first player must exhaust 2 characters to travel here.
shadow: Shadow: Remove 1 progress token from the current quest.

name: Perilous Swamp
text: No more than 1 progress token can be placed on Perilous Swamp each round.
