text: If Frodo's Choice is not in play, any time players would place progress on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead.  Forced: After Frodo's Choice is revealed at this stage, advance to stage 4A.  Response: After you quest successfully, discard a non-unique location in any staging area.

name: Guard the Hobbits
text: Forced: After stage 2B is discarded, if the total [threat] of encounter cards in this staging area is less than 4, reveal 1 encounter card.

name: Guard the Hobbits
text: If Frodo's Choice is not in play, any time players would place progress on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead.  Forced: After Frodo's Choice is revealed at this stage, advance to stage 4A.  Response: After you quest successfully, choose a player. Ready each of that player's heroes.

name: The Seat of Amon Hen
text: Forced: After stage 2B is discarded, if the total [threat] of encounter cards in this staging area is less than 4, reveal 1 encounter card.

name: The Seat of Amon Hen
text: If Frodo's Choice is not in play, any time players would place progress on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead.  Forced: After Frodo's Choice is revealed at this stage, advance to stage 4A.  Response: After you quest successfully, choose a player. That player draws 2 cards and lowers his threat by 2.

name: Orc Hunting
text: Forced: After stage 2B is discarded, if the total [threat] of encounter cards in this staging area is less than 4, reveal 1 encounter card.

name: Orc Hunting
text: If Frodo's Choice is not in play, any time players would place progress on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead.  Forced: After Frodo's Choice is revealed at this stage, advance to stage 4A.  Response: After you quest successfully, discard an enemy engaged with a player.

name: The Ring-bearer Sets Out
text: When Revealed: Add Parth Galen to the staging area. If it is your quest phase, end the phase (do not resolve the quest).

name: The Ring-bearer Sets Out
text: During the quest phase, reveal 1 additional encounter card for each player in the game. Response: After an enemy is revealed at this stage, raise your threat by X to engage that enemy. X is that enemy's [threat]. Each player (at any stage) may trigger this ability once per round.  When this stage is defeated, the players win the game.

name: Frodo's Choice
keywords: If Frodo's Choice is discarded, reveal it instead.
text: When Revealed: Take control of the first player token and the Ring-bearer (and each card attached to it). Attach to the Ring-bearer. For the rest of the game, you cannot lose control of the first player token.

name: Uruk-hai Captain
text: Allies with fewer printed hit points than Uruk-hai Captain cannot defend against Uruk-hai Captain.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.

name: Uruk-hai Archer
text: X is the number of players at this stage.  When Revealed: Discard an ally you control.

name: Uruk-hai Tracker
text: Uruk-hai Tracker gets +2 [attack] against characters with 2 or fewer printed hit points.
shadow: Shadow: Discard a non-objective attachment you control.

name: Uruk-hai Hunter
text: When Revealed: Either choose a player to reveal an encounter card, or Uruk-hai Hunter makes an immediate attack against you.

name: Parth Galen
text: Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and add it to the staging area to travel here. Shuffle the encounter deck. While Parth Galen is in play, the players cannot win the game.

name: Seat of Seeing
text: Response: When Seat of Seeing is explored, choose a burden card in play, in the encounter deck, or in the discard pile, and remove it from the game. Shuffle the encounter deck. (If you are playing campaign mode, remove that card from the Campaign Pool.)

name: The Argonath
keywords: Immune to player card effects. X is the number of players in the game.
text: The players cannot travel here while Sarn Gebir is in play. While The Argonath is the active location, skip the combat phase.

name: Sarn Gebir
text: Forced: When Sarn Gebir is explored, deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

name: River Anduin
text: While River Anduin is in the staging area it gains: "Forced: At the end of the travel phase, each player at this stage raises his threat by 1. Then, River Anduin moves to the staging area to the left, if able."

name: Wooded Shoreline
keywords: While Wooded Shoreline is in the staging area, it gains archery 2.
text: Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and add it to the staging area to travel here. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Slopes of Amon Hen
text: Travel: A player at this staging area must engage an enemy in any staging area to travel here.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack] (+2 [attack] instead if the defending character has fewer printed hit points than the attacking enemy).

name: Growing Threat
text: When Revealed: Either move 1 enemy engaged with you to the first player's staging area, or Growing Threat gains doomed 2 and surge.
shadow: Shadow: After this attack, move attacking enemy to the first player's staging area.

name: Orcs of the White Hand
text: When Revealed: Remove all damage from each enemy at this stage. Each enemy at this stage gets +1 [threat], +1 [attack], and +1 [defense] until the end of the round.
shadow: Shadow: If the defending character has fewer printed hit points than the attacking enemy, this attack is considered undefended.

name: Black Feathered Arrows
text: When Revealed: Until the end of the round, add 1 to the archery total at this stage for each ally currently at this stage.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack] (+2 [attack] instead if the defending character has fewer printed hit points than the attacking enemy).

name: Fallen into Evil
text: When Revealed: Attach to a hero and move it to the first player's staging area. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached hero loses the hero card type and gains the enemy card type with [threat] equal to its [willpower] and engagement cost equal to its threat cost. If Fallen into Evil is discarded, return attached hero to its owner's control."

name: Lust for the Ring
text: When Revealed: Attach to a non-[fellowship] hero in play. Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: After The One Ring exhausts, raise each player's threat by 1 and reduce attached hero's [willpower] to 0 until the end of the round."

name: Shadow of Fear
text: When Revealed: Treat the printed text box of each character in play as blank (except for Traits) until the end of the round.
shadow: Shadow: Defending character does not count its [defense].

name: Pursued by the Enemy
text: When Revealed: Each enemy engaged with a player, and not in the staging area, makes an immediate attack.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.

name: Overcome by Grief
text: Setup: Add Overcome by Grief to the staging area. Forced: After a character is destroyed, if Overcome by Grief is unattached, attach to a hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: After a character you control is destroyed, exhaust attached hero. Until the end of the round, attached hero cannot ready.")

name: Grievous Wound
text: Setup: Add Grievous Wound to the staging area. Forced: After a hero takes damage, if Grievous Wound is unattached, attach to that hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: After attached hero exhausts, deal 1 damage to it.")

name: Followed by Night
text: When Revealed: Put the topmost enemy of the encounter deck discard pile into play engaged with you.

name: Ill Fate
text: When Revealed: Attach to a hero you control. (Counts as a Condition Attachment with the text: "Forced: After a character you control is destroyed, raise your threat by 2.")

name: The One Ring
text: Setup: The first player claims The One Ring and attaches it to the Ring-bearer.  Attached hero does not count against the hero limit. The first player gains control of attached hero.   If The One Ring leaves play, the players lose the game.

name: Aragorn
text: The first player gains control of Aragorn. If Aragorn leaves play, the players lose the game.   Action: Spend 2 resources from Aragorn's resource pool to ready a hero.

name: Théoden
text: Lower the cost of the first Rohan ally you play from your hand each round by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

name: Treebeard
text: Action: Deal 1 damage on Treebeard to give him +1 [willpower] and +1 [attack] until the end of the phase. (Limit 5 times per phase.)

name: Gimli
text: Response: After an enemy is revealed from the encounter deck, ready Gimli.

name: Legolas
text: Response: After Legolas participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, draw 1 card.

name: Quickbeam
keywords: Cannot have attachments. Enters play exhausted.
text: Response: After Quickbeam enters play, deal 1 damage to him to ready him.

name: Háma
text: Combat Action: Ready Hama. He gets +3 [defense] until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase, discard Hama. (Limit once per round.)

name: Arod
keywords: Attach to a hero or Legolas
text: Response: After attached character participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, exhaust Arod to place 1 progress token on any location.

name: Ent Draught
keywords: Play only if you control at least 1 Ent character.
text: Attach to a character. Limit 1 per character. Attached character gets +2 hit points.

name: Herugrim
keywords: Attach to a Rohan hero. Restricted.
text: Reduce the cost to play Herugrim on Theoden by 1. Response: After attached hero is declared as an attacker, exhaust Herugrim to add attached hero's [willpower] to its [attack] for this attack.

name: Entmoot
keywords: Play only if you control at least 1 Ent character.
text: Action: Search the top 5 cards of your deck for any number of Ent cards and add them to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Helm! Helm!
keywords: Play only after the resolving enemy attacks step is complete.
text: Combat Action: Exhaust and discard a Rohan ally you control to choose and discard a non-unique enemy engaged with you.

name: The Three Hunters
keywords: Play only if you control [fellowship] Aragorn.
text: Quest Action: Choose 3 heroes committed to the quest. Ready those heroes. Until the end of the round, each of the chosen heroes gets +1 [willpower], +1 [attack], and +1 [defense].

name: Shadowfax
text: Gandalf gains ranged and sentinel.   Action: Exhaust Shadowfax to ready Gandalf.

name: Intimidation
text: Setup: Attach to a Warrior hero.   Response: After attached hero is declared as the only attacker against a non-unique enemy, exhaust Intimidation to give that enemy -2 [defense] for this attack.

name: Hands of a Healer
text: Setup: Attach to a Healer hero.  Action: Exhaust attached hero and Hands of a Healer to heal up to 3 damage from a hero.

name: Forewarned
text: Setup: Attach to a Ranger hero.  Response: After attached hero is declared as a defender against a non-unique enemy, exhaust Forewarned to discard 1 shadow card from that enemy.

name: Leader of Men
text: Setup: Attach to a Noble hero.   Response: After attached hero quests successfully, exhaust Leader of Men to add 1 resource to attached hero's pool.

name: Beyond All Hope
text: Setup: Attach to a hero.  Attached hero gets +1 [willpower], +1 [attack], +1 [defense] and cannot have treachery card attachments.

name: Palantír of Orthanc
text: Quest Action: Exhaust Aragorn and Palantir of Orthanc to discard the top card of the encounter deck. If Aragorn's [willpower] is greater than the discarded card's [threat], you may add Palantir of Orthanc to the victory display and remove it from the campaign pool to choose a player. That player reveals 1 fewer encounter card this phase (to a minimum of 0).

name: Poisoned Counsels
keywords: Poisoned Counsels functions like a player card.
text: Forced: After you draw this card, discard all other cards in your hand.

name: To Isengard!
text: Treat each Captive's text box as blank. Captive heroes are in play but are not under any player's control. If there are no Captives in play, the players lose the game.  Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, increase the pursuit value by 1. Then, if the pursuit value is 30 or greater, the players lose the game.

name: Uglúk
text: Allies cannot be declared as attackers or defenders against Ugluk.

name: Grishnákh
text: Forced: After Grishnakh enters play, the first player attaches 1 of the Captives to him. If Grishnakh is defeated, place the attached Captive faceup underneath To Isengard!   Forced: At the end of the quest phase, deal 1 damage to the attached Captive.

name: Uglúk's Uruk-hai
text: When Revealed: Either increase the pursuit value by 3, or reveal an additional encounter card.

name: The Wold
text: While The Wold is the active location, it gains: "Response: After The Wold is explored, each player draws 1 card."   Travel: Increase the pursuit value by 1.

name: Eastemnet
text: While Eastemnet is the active location, it gains: "Response: After Eastemnet is explored, add 1 resource to each hero's resource pool."   Travel: Increase the pursuit value by 1.

name: Plains of Rohan
keywords: X is the number of locations in the staging area.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. If this attack destroys a character, increase the pursuit value by 1.

name: Banks of Entwash
text: Forced: After any amount of progress is placed on Banks of Entwash, increase the pursuit value by 1.
shadow: Shadow: Either increase the pursuit value by 1, or this attack is considered undefended.

name: Rest by Night?
text: When Revealed: Either immediately end the quest phase and increase the pursuit value by 3, or deal 1 damage to each character committed to the quest. This effect cannot be canceled.

name: Strange Weariness
text: When Revealed: Each character committed to the quest gets -1 [willpower] until the end of the round.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.

name: Unseen Barrier
text: When Revealed: The players cannot place more than 3 progress on the current quest this round. (This does not count progress placed on any active location.)
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. If this attack destroys a character, increase the pursuit value by 1.

name: The Defense of Helm's Deep
keywords: Add 1 to the total [threat] in the staging area for each resource token here.
text: Forced: At the end of the quest phase, place 1 resource token here.   If there are 8 resource tokens here, add The Defense of Helm's Deep to the victory display and advance to stage 5A.

name: Wild Hillman
text: Forced: After Wild Hillman attacks, place 1 progress on the active location.
shadow: Shadow: Place 1 progress on the active location. Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack] for each progress on the active location.

name: Warrior of Dunland
text: When Revealed: Warrior of Dunland makes an immediate attack against you.  Forced: After Warrior of Dunland attacks and destroys a character, place 3 progress on the active location.

name: Soldier of Isengard
text: Forced: After Soldier of Isengard attacks and destroys a character, place 1 progress on the current quest.
shadow: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.

name: The Hornburg
text: While The Hornburg is the active location, reduce the archery total by 1 for each player in the game.  Forced: When The Hornburg is explored, assign X damage among characters in play. X is the number of enemies in play.

name: Deeping Wall
keywords: While Deeping Wall is the active location, each hero gets +1 [defense].
text: Forced: When Deeping Wall is explored, raise each player's threat by 4.

name: Deeping Culvert
keywords: X is 1 more than the number of allies controlled by the first player.
text: Forced: When Deeping Culvert is explored, each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy, reveals it, and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Postern Door
keywords: While Postern Door is the active location, each hero gets +1 [attack].
text: Forced: When Postern Door is explored, until the end of the round, players cannot declare attacks.

name: Helm's Gate
text: While Helm's Gate is the active location, if any player is not engaged with an enemy, the first player reveals an encounter card at the end of each staging step.   Forced: When Helm's Gate is explored, each enemy gets -20 engagement cost and +2 [attack] until the end of the round.

name: Scaling Ladders
text: Surge. When Revealed: Attach to the active location. (Counts as a Siege attachment with the text: "Each enemy gets +1 [threat].")
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. If this attack destroys a character, place 1 progress on the current quest.

name: Devilry of Saruman
text: When Revealed: Place 3 progress on the current quest (bypassing any active location). Until the end of the round, treat each character's text box as it was blank (except for Traits).
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +2 [attack] and gains Toughness 2 until the end of the round.

name: Reckless Hate
text: Peril. When Revealed: The enemy in the staging area with the highest [attack] makes an immediate attack against you. If no attack is made this way, Reckless Hate gains surge.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.

name: Night Without End
text: Peril. Doomed 2. When Revealed: Either remove 1 resource token from The Defense of Helm's Deep, or reveal 2 additional encounter cards.
shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.

name: Ent of Fangorn
text: While Ent of Fangorn is in the staging area, it gains: "Quest Action: Exhaust a hero you control to discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that hero's [willpower] is greater than the discarded card's [threat], place 1 resource here. Then, if there are 3 resources here, discard them to take control of Ent of Fangorn. Any player may trigger this effect."

name: Saruman
keywords: Indestructible. Immune to player card effects. Cannot leave the staging area.
text: Forced: When Saruman is dealt a shadow card with the Wizardry keyword, the defending player resolves its effect as if he is the only player in the game.

name: Saruman's Staff
text: Forced: After a player draws any number of cards, Saruman attacks that player. Deal and resolve 2 shadow cards for this attack. Then, remove 1 damage from Saruman.   While Saruman has any hit points remaining, the players cannot win the game.

name: Gríma
text: Doomed 2. Forced: After Grima attacks a player, that player shuffles Grima back into the encounter deck and reveals an encounter card.
shadow: Shadow: This attack is considered undefended.

name: Lieutenant of Orthanc
text: Forced: After Lieutenant of Orthanc attacks and destroys a character, that character's controller discards 1 random card from his hand.

name: Isengard Orc
text: Peril. Archery 1. When Revealed: Either discard 1 random card from your hand, or reveal an encounter card.
shadow: Shadow: Until the end of the round, attacking enemy gets +2 [defense].

name: Wolf of Isengard
text: Forced: When Wolf of Isengard is dealt a shadow card with the Wizardry keyword, either discard 1 card from your hand, or Wolf of Isengard makes an additional attack against you after this one.
shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to defending character.

name: Orthanc
text: While Orthanc is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After the players quest successfully, the first player looks at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck, reveals 1, and discards the others."

name: Gates of Isengard
text: Forced: When Gates of Isengard is explored, each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and puts it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Ring-wall of Isengard
text: While Ring-wall of Isengard is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After any amount of damage is healed from a character, its owner discards 1 card from his hand."   Wizardry: Each player discards 1 random card from his hand.

name: Underground Armoury
text: While Underground Armoury is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After an enemy engages a player, deal it a shadow card."   Wizardry: Each player exhausts a character he controls.

name: Steaming Vent
text: While Steaming Vent is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After a player commits characters to the quest, he deals 1 damage to a questing character he controls."   Wizardry: Assign X damage among characters in play. X is 1 more than the number of players in the game.

name: Plain of Isengard
keywords: X is the number of players in the game.
text: While Plain of Isengard is in the staging area, archery damage must be assigned to allies, if able.   Wizardry: Each player discards 1 ally he controls.

name: Open Pit
text: While Open Pit is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After a player draws any number of cards from a player card effect, he raises his threat by 2."  Wizardry: Each player raises his threat by 2.

name: Blast of Sorcery
text: When Revealed: Assign X damage among characters committed to the quest. X is 1 more than the number of players in the game.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack] (+2 [attack] instead if the defending player has 1 or fewer cards in his hand).

name: Poisoned Vapour
text: Surge. When Revealed: Exhaust each damaged character. Until the end of the combat phase, treat each damaged character's text box as if was blank.
shadow: Shadow: Discard a non-objective attachment you control.

name: Machines of Isengard
text: When Revealed: Trigger the Wizardry effect on the active location. If no Wizardry effect is triggered this way, Machines of Isengard gains surge.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. If this attack destroys a character, discard 1 random card from your hand.

name: Isengard Uruk
text: When Revealed: Either assign 3 damage among characters you control, or reveal an additional encounter card.

name: Uruk-hai Fighter
text: Forced: After Uruk-hai Fighter attacks and destroys a character, return it to the staging area.
shadow: Shadow: Discard a non-objective attachment you control.

name: Fighting Uruk-hai
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for an Uruk-hai enemy, reveal it, and put it into play engaged with you. Shuffle the encounter deck. Until the end of the round, each enemy engaged with you adds its [threat] to the total [threat] in the staging area.

name: Snaga
text: When Revealed: Discard 1 random card from your hand. Snaga gets +X [threat] until the end of the round, where X is the discarded card's cost.

name: Saruman's Orders
text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either return an enemy engaged with him to the staging area, or reveal an encounter card.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. If this attack destroys a character, return attacking enemy to the staging area.

name: Saruman's Voice
text: When Revealed: Remove a hero from the quest and attach Saruman's Voice to that hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: When attached hero commits to the quest, is declared as an attacker or defender, or triggers its ability, its controller must discard 1 card from his hand.")

name: Follow the Orcs
text: Setup: Make Eastemnet the active location. Add Ugluk and To Isengard! to the staging area. Each player chooses 1 non-[fellowship] hero he controls to be a Captive and places it faceup underneath To Isengard! Set the pursuit value to 10.

name: Follow the Orcs
text: X is the pursuit value.  Ugluk cannot leave the staging area or take damage.  Forced: At the end of the combat phase, increase the pursuit value by 1 for each enemy in the staging area.

name: Rescue the Captives
text: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an Uruk-hai enemy, reveals it, and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Rescue the Captives
text: X is the pursuit value.  Response: After an enemy is defeated, reduce the pursuit value by 1.  The players cannot defeat this stage while Ugluk is in play. If the players defeat this stage, they have rescued each Captive hero and won the game.

name: The Uruk-hai
encounterSet: The Lord of the Rings Part 7
text: Setup: Remove Gildor Inglorion and Mr. Underhill from the Campaign Pool. Remove each burden with the following burden set icons from the encounter deck: (Shadow of the Past, Flight to the Ford, The Ring Goes South)

name: The Uruk-hai
encounterSet: The Lord of the Rings Part 7
text: Resolution: If the pursuit value is 25 or lower, the players must choose: either each player earns one of the Skill boons (Intimidation, Hands of a Healer, Forewarned, or Leader of Men) and attaches it to a hero he controls, or one player earns the boon, Beyond All Hope, and chooses a hero from the list of fallen heroes. That player takes control of the chosen hero (removing it from the list of fallen heroes) and attaches Beyond all Hope to it. If a player controls more than 3 non-[fellowship] heroes, he must remove heroes from the Campaign Log until he controls only 3 heroes. Changing heroes as a result of earning Beyond All Hope does not incur a +1 threat penalty. Add the earned cards to the Campaign Pool.

name: The King of the Golden Hall
text: Setup: Set The Defense of Helm's Deep and 1 copy of Deeping Wall aside, out of play. Each player sets 1 copy of Soldier of Isengard aside, out of play. Then, the players must choose: either each player shuffles 1 copy of Poisoned Counsels into his deck, or advance to stage 2A (bypassing stage 1B).

name: The King of the Golden Hall
text: When Revealed: Each player chooses 1 ally in his hand that matches the sphere of a hero he controls and puts it into play under his control.  Skip the quest phase and combat phase.  Forced: At the end of the round, advance to stage 2A.

name: Assault on Helm's Deep
text: When Revealed: Add The Defense of Helm's Deep and each set aside copy of Soldier of Isengard to the staging area. Make Deeping Wall the active location. Shuffle the encounter deck. Then, each player reveals 1 encounter card.

name: Assault on Helm's Deep
text: Defense.  Forced: At the end of the combat phase, if the number of enemies in the staging area is less than the number of players in the game, the first player reveals an encounter card.  Forced: At the end of the round place 1 progress here for each enemy in the staging area (bypassing any active location).

name: The Hosts of Isengard
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck, discard pile, and victory display for Helm's Gate and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. Make Helm's Gate the active location, returning any previous active location to the staging area.

name: The Hosts of Isengard
text: Defense.  Forced: After resolving the quest, if the encounter deck did not place at least 1 progress on this stage as the result of questing, the first player reveals 1 encounter card.

name: The Wall is Breached!
text: When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Discard cards from the encounter deck until X enemies are discarded. X is the number of players. Add each enemy discarded this way to the staging area.

name: The Wall is Breached!
text: Defense.  Forced: After a character is destroyed, place 1 progress on this stage (bypassing any active location).   If this stage is defeated, the players lose the game.

name: The King Rides Out
text: When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Discard cards from the encounter deck until X enemies are discarded. X is the number of players. Add each enemy discarded this way to the staging area.

name: The King Rides Out
text: Skip the quest phase. Players cannot reduce their threat.  If there are no enemies in play, the players win the game.

name: Helm's Deep
encounterSet: The Lord of the Rings Part 8
text: Setup: Each player may change hero cards without incurring the +1 threat penalty. Remove each burden with the following burden set icons from the encounter deck: (Shadow of the Past, Flight to the Ford, The Ring Goes South)

name: Helm's Deep
encounterSet: The Lord of the Rings Part 8
text: Resolution: Each player with a copy of Poisoned Counsels in his hand, deck or discard pile has earned that burden. Add the earned cards to the campaign pool.

name: Rouse the Ents
text: Setup: Set Gates of Isengard, Orthanc, Saruman, and Saruman's Staff aside, out of play. Add each copy of Ent of Fangorn to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Rouse the Ents
text: Players cannot draw cards or gain resources. Do not commit characters to the quest or reveal encounter cards during the quest phase.  Forced: At the end of the round, place 1 resource here. Then, the players may advance to stage 2. If the players advance, the first player shuffles the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and reveals 1 encounter card for each resource here. Then, remove each Ent objective in the staging area from the game.

name: Breaking Isengard
text: When Revealed: Make Gates of Isengard the active location. Add Saruman and Orthanc to the staging area.

name: Breaking Isengard
text: The players cannot travel to Orthanc.   Forced: After a non-unique location is explored, place 1 damage here. Then, if there are 5 damage tokens here, advance to stage 3A.   Quest Action: Exhaust Ent of Fangorn to place 2 progress on a non-unique location.

name: The Voice of Saruman
text: When Revealed: Each player draws 6 cards. Each player with more than 6 cards in his hand discards cards from his hand until he has only 6. Attach Saruman's Staff to Saruman.

name: The Voice of Saruman
text: While Orthanc is the active location, Saruman is considered to be engaged with the first player.  Forced: When Orthanc is explored, cancel any progress placed on the quest this phase and return Orthanc to the staging area.  If a player has 0 cards in his hand, he is eliminated from the game. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

name: The Road to Isengard
encounterSet: The Lord of the Rings Part 9
text: Setup: Shuffle Saruman's Voice into the encounter deck. Remove each burden with these burden set icons from the encounter deck: (Shadow of the Past, Flight to the Ford, The Ring Goes South)

name: The Road to Isengard
encounterSet: The Lord of the Rings Part 9
text: Resolution: If any player has 3 or fewer cards in his hand, the players have earned the Saruman's Voice burden card. If any player has 3 or more cards in his hand, the players have earned the Palantir of Orthanc boon card. Add the earned cards to the Campaign Pool.

name: Frodo Baggins
text: Action:Spend 1 [fellowship] resource and exhaust The One Ring to give Frodo Baggins +2 [willpower] and +2 [attack] until the end of the round.

name: Faramir
text: Response: After you engage an enemy, ready an ally you control. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Damrod
text: Reduce the cost of the first Trap card you play each round by 1 (to a minimum of 0).  Response: After a Trap card you control is attached to an enemy, draw 1 card.

name: Anborn
text: Response: After an enemy is added to the staging area, exhaust Anborn to give that enemy +5 engagement cost until the end of the round. Then, deal 1 damage to that enemy.

name: Mablung
text: Response: After Mablung enters play, choose an enemy to get +5 engagement cost until the end of the round. Then, you may engage that enemy, or return it to the staging area.

name: Skinbark
keywords: Cannot have restricted attachments. Enters play exhausted.
text: While Skinbark is attacking alone against an Orc enemy, that enemy does not count its [defense].

name: Gamling
text: Response: After a Rohan ally you control is discarded from play, exhaust Gamling to return that character to your hand.

name: Staff of Lebethron
keywords: Attach to a Gondor or Hobbit hero. Restricted.
text: Response: After attached hero exhausts to defend an enemy with engagement cost higher than your threat, exhaust Staff of Lebethron to discard a shadow card from that enemy.

name: Ambush
keywords: Play Ambush into the staging area unattached. If unattached, attach Ambush to the next eligible enemy that enters the staging area.
text: Combat Action: The engaged player discards Ambush to declare an attack against the attached enemy.

name: Snowmane
keywords: Attach to a Rohan hero. Restricted.
text: If attached hero is Theoden, Snowmane loses the restricted keyword. Response: After the players quest successfully, ready attached hero.

name: Taste it Again!
text: Response: After a hero you control defends an attack made by an enemy with engagement cost higher than your threat, ready that hero. Until the end of the phase, that hero gets +2 [attack] while attacking that enemy.

name: In the Shadows
keywords: Lower the cost to play In the Shadows by 1 for each Hobbit or Ranger hero you control.
text: Combat Action: Each enemy engaged with you with engagement cost higher than your threat gets -1 [attack] and -1 [defense] until the end of the phase.

name: Speak Your Promise!
text: Action: Ready the Ring-bearer to choose an enemy engaged with you. If the Ring-bearer's [willpower] is greater than that enemy's [threat], lower that enemy's [attack] and [defense] by the difference until the end of the phase.

name: Brace of Coneys
keywords: Play only if you control the Ring-bearer.
text: Planning Action: Add Brace of Coneys to the victory display to (choose 2): heal up to 2 damage from a hero, add 2 resources to a hero's pool, choose a player to draw 2 cards, or reduce a player's threat by 2.

name: The Searching Eye
keywords: The Searching Eye functions like a player card.
text: Forced: After you draw this card, either exhaust each hero you control, or reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

name: Groping Dead
text: The engaged player cannot reduce his threat.  Forced: After Groping Dead destroys a character, place 1 mire token on the active location.
shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, place 1 mire token on the active location.

name: Dead Things
text: The engaged player cannot reduce his threat. Forced: After Dead Things destroys a character, the defending player must raise his threat by 3.
shadow: Shadow: Raise your threat by 1 for each Undead enemy engaged with you.

name: Candle-bearer
keywords: The engaged player cannot reduce his threat.
text: Forced: After Candle-bearer destroys a character, it cannot take damage until the end of the round.
shadow: Shadow: Until the end of the round, attacking enemy cannot take damage.

name: Evil-smelling Fens
keywords: Mire 3. Forced: When Evilsmelling Fens is discarded by the Mire keyword, deal 1 damage to each character.
text: Travel: Raise each player's threat by 1 to travel here.
shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to defending character.

name: Shifting Quagmire
keywords: Surge. Mire 1. Forced: When Shifting Quagmire is discarded by the Mire keyword, either return a random location from the victory display to the staging area, or raise each player's threat by 1 for each location in the victory display.
text: Travel: Spend 1 [fellowship] resource to travel here.

name: Haunted Mere
keywords: Mire 2. Forced: When Haunted Mere is discarded by the Mire keyword, search the encounter deck and discard pile for an Undead enemy, reveal it, and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.
text: Travel: Exhaust Smeagol to travel here.

name: Stagnant Pools
keywords: Mire 5. Forced: When Stagnant Pools is discarded by the Mire keyword, raise each player's threat by 5.
text: Stagnant Pools gets +1 [threat] for each mire token on it.   Travel: Exhaust Smeagol to travel here.

name: Soft Mires
keywords: Mire 1. Forced: When Soft Mires is discarded by the Mire keyword, the first player reveals the top card of the encounter deck.
text: Travel: Each player must raise his threat by 1 to travel here.

name: Creeping Marshes
text: When Revealed: Attach to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, place 1 mire token on each location in the staging area. Then, discard Creeping Marshes.")

name: Bitter Reek
text: Peril. When Revealed: Either raise your threat by 1 for each character you control that is committed to the quest, or deal 1 damage to each character committed to the quest.
shadow: Shadow: Raise your threat by the attacking enemy's [threat].

name: A Fell Light
text: Peril. When Revealed: Put the topmost Undead enemy in the encounter discard pile into play engaged with you. Each Undead enemy engaged with you makes an immediate attack.
shadow: Shadow: Return the topmost Undead enemy in the encounter discard pile to the staging area.

name: The Black Gate
text: Forced: At the end of the planning phase, place each Harad enemy in the staging area facedown under The Black Gate.  If there are at least X facedown cards under The Black Gate, the players lose the game. X is 3 more than the number of players.

name: Man of Harad
text: Forced: After Man of Harad engages you, discard 1 random card from your hand.
shadow: Shadow: Discard 1 random card from your hand.

name: Captain of Harad
text: Forced: After Captain of Harad engages you, each Harad enemy gets +1 [attack] and 10 engagement cost until the end of the round.
shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, return attacking enemy to the staging area.

name: The Cross-roads
text: The Cross-roads gets -1 [threat] for each facedown card under it. The players cannot travel here unless there are no facedown cards under The Cross-roads and at least 20 progress tokens on stage 1B.

name: Henneth Annun
text: While Henneth Annun is the active location, skip both the encounter phase and combat phase, and  ignore the Forced effects on stage 1B and The Black Gate.  Forced: After Henneth Annun becomes the active location, return each engaged enemy to the staging area.

name: Southward Road
text: While Southward Road is the active location, each player may optionally engage an additional enemy during the encounter phase.   Travel: The first player reveals the top facedown card underneath The Crossroads and adds it to the staging area to travel here.

name: Foothills of Ephel Duath
text: While Foothills of Ephel Duath is the active location, each Harad enemy gets -1 [threat].  Travel: The first player engages an enemy in the staging area to travel here.

name: Ithilien Woods
text: While Ithilien Woods is the active location, it gains: "Forced: After a player engages a Harad enemy, he readies a character he controls."  Travel: The first player reveals the top card of the encounter deck to travel here.

name: Hills of Ithilien
text: While Hills of Ithilien is the active location, it gains: "Forced: After a player engages a Harad enemy, deal 1 damage to that enemy."
shadow: Shadow: Discard a nonobjective attachment you control.

name: The Dark Lord's Summons
text: When Revealed: Either place the lowest [attack] Harad enemy engaged with you facedown under The Black Gate, or reveal the top facedown card from under The Cross-roads and put it into play engaged with you.

name: Marching Up the Road
text: When Revealed: Each player must either return an enemy engaged with him to the staging area, or search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Harad enemy and put it into play engaged with him.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. If this attack destroys a character, place attacking enemy facedown under The Black Gate.

name: Fierce Southrons
text: When Revealed: Either place the lowest [threat] Harad enemy in the staging area facedown under The Black Gate and reveal an additional encounter card, or each enemy in the staging area makes an immediate attack against you.

name: Arrows Thick in the Air
text: When Revealed: Each Harad enemy gains Archery 2 until the end of the round.
shadow: Shadow: Either place attacking enemy facedown under The Black Gate after this attack, or it makes an additional attack against you after this one.

name: Shelob
text: Shelob gets +1 [threat] for each resource on her.  Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, either place 1 resource on Shelob, or she makes an immediate attack against the first player.

name: Morgul Orc
text: When Revealed: Either discard 1 random card from your hand, or reveal an additional encounter card.
shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, discard 1 random card from your hand.

name: Orc of Citith Ungol
text: When Revealed: Either discard 1 random card from each player's hand, or Orc of Cirith Ungol makes an immediate attack against you.

name: Morgul Vale
text: Forced: After Morgul Vale is explored, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Morgul Wraith and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. Then, the first player must either exhaust The One Ring, or discard 1 random card from each player's hand.

name: Smeagol's Secret Way
text: Travel: Either exhaust Smeagol, or discard 1 random card from each player's hand.  Forced: After Smeagol's Secret Way is explored, each player either exhausts a character he controls, or discards 1 random card from his hand.

name: Cleft of Cirith Ungol
text: While The Cleft of Cirith Ungol is in the victory display, Shelob gets +2 [attack], loses Indestructible, and gains: "Shelob engages the first player."  Travel: Place 1 resource on Shelob to travel here.

name: The Spider's Lair
text: Forced: When The Spider's Lair is explored, remove 1 resource from Shelob.  Forced: After The Spider's Lair becomes the active location, Shelob makes an attack against the first player.

name: The Under-way
text: While The Under-way is in the staging area, each Orc enemy gets -5 engagement cost and gains: "Forced: After this enemy engages a player, deal it a shadow card."
shadow: Shadow: Deal the attacking enemy 2 additional shadow cards.

name: Deep Dark Passage
text: While Deep Dark Passage is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: When any amount of progress would be placed on a location in the staging area, reduce that amount by 1."  Travel: Exhaust Smeagol to travel here.

name: Den of Night
text: While Den of Night is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After a 'When Revealed' effect is canceled, place 1 resource on Shelob."  Travel: Place 1 resource on Shelob to travel here.

name: Exhalation of Decay
text: When Revealed: Each player discards 1 random card from his hand and 1 non-objective attachment he controls.
shadow: Shadow: Discard a non-objective attachment you control.

name: Many Openings
text: When Revealed: Each location in the staging area gets +1 [threat] until the end of the round. If the number of locations in the staging area is less than the number of players in the game, reveal an additional encounter card.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X [attack], where X is the active location's [threat].

name: A Heavy Burden
keywords: Permanent. Setup: Attach to the Ring-bearer.
text: Forced: At the end of the planning phase, either raise each player's threat by 1, or exhaust the Ring-bearer.

name: Morgul Wraith
text: While The One Ring is exhausted, Morgul Wraith gets -30 engagement cost and gains "immune to player card effects."

name: Call of the Ring
text: When Revealed: The first player must choose: either search the encounter deck, discard pile, and victory display for a Nazgul enemy and add it to the staging area, or exhaust The One Ring and reveal the top card of the encounter deck.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.

name: We Hates Them
text: When Revealed: Either flip Smeagol to Gollum, or Gollum makes an immediate attack. The first player may spend 1 [fellowship] resource and exhaust The One Ring to cancel this effect.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack] (+3 [attack] instead if the attacking enemy is Gollum).

name: Oliphaunt
keywords: Cannot have attachments or take more than 3 damage each round.
text: Forced: After Oliphaunt engages you, exhaust each ally you control.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +3 [attack].

name: Haradrim Soldier
text: Forced: After Haradrim Soldier engages you, it makes an immediate attack.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.

name: Haradrim Archer
keywords: Archery X. X is the number of players in the game.
text: Forced: After Haradrim Archer engages you, assign X damage among characters you control.
shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character.

name: Blocked Tunnel
text: When Revealed: Make Blocked Tunnel the active location, returning any other active location to the staging area.  Action: Exhaust a character with a Weapon attachment to place 3 progress on Blocked Tunnel. (Any player may trigger this effect.)

name: Shelob's Poison
text: When Revealed: Attach to a hero you control and exhaust that hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Treat attached hero's text box as blank, except for Traits. Attached hero cannot ready.")
shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is Shelob, resolve the 'When Revealed' effect on Shelob's Poison.

name: Lurking Malice
text: When Revealed: Either place 1 resource on Shelob, or she makes an immediate attack against you.
shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is Shelob, place 1 resource on her. Then, she gets +1 [attack] for each resource on her.

name: Rage and Hunger
text: When Revealed: Shelob gets +2 [attack] until the end of the phase. Then, she makes an immediate attack against each player, in player order.
shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is Shelob, she makes an additional attack against you after this one.

name: The One Ring
text: Setup: The first player claims The One Ring and attaches it to the Ring-bearer. Attached hero does not count against the hero limit. The first player gains control of attached hero. If The One Ring leaves play, the players lose the game.

name: The Taming of Smeagol
text: Setup: Put Gollum into play engaged with the first player. Each player searches the encounter deck for 1 location, reveals it, and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: The Taming of Smeagol
text: The players cannot advance unless the first player controls Smeagol.  Forced: After a player declares any number of attackers against Gollum, discard the top card of the encounter deck. Gollum gets +X [defense] for this attack, where X is the discarded card's [threat].

name: Across the Marshes
text: When Revealed: If the number of locations in the staging area is less than the number of players in the game, discard cards from the encounter deck until a location is discarded. Then, add the discarded location to the staging area.

name: Across the Dead Marshes
text: Progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area.  The players cannot advance unless the first player controls Smeagol and there are at least 4 locations in the victory display.  Forced: At the end of the staging step, if the number of locations in the staging area is less than the number of players in the game, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

name: Don't Look at the Lights!
text: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an Undead enemy and puts it into play engaged with him. Shuffle all locations in the victory display into the encounter deck.

name: Don't Look at the Lights!
text: While any player is engaged with an Undead enemy, progress cannot be placed on this stage.  The players cannot defeat this stage unless the first player controls Smeagol. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

name: The Passage of the Marshes
text: Setup: Each player shuffles 1 copy of The Searching Eye into his deck. Remove each burden with the following burden set icons from the encounter deck and each player's deck: HD, RtI.

name: The Passage of the Marshes
text: Resolution: Each player must choose: either take a permanent +2 starting threat penalty, or earn 1 copy of The Seatching Eye. Record each player's choice in the campaign log.

name: Ambush the Men of Harad
text: Setup: Add The Black Gate and The Crossroads to the staging area. Shuffle the Men of Harad encounter set and place it facedown under The Crossroads. Each player, except the first player, searches the encounter deck for a different non-unique location adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Ambush the Men of Harad
text: Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, reveal the top card facedown card from under The Crossroads and add it to the staging area.  The players cannot defeat this stage while The Crossroads is in play. When The Cross roads is explored, the players win the game.

name: Journey to the Cross-roads
text: Setup: Each player must choose: either add 1 resource to each of his heroes' pools, or shuffle 1 copy of Brace of Coneys into his deck. Remove each burden with the following burden set icons from the encounter deck and each player's deck: HD, RtI

name: Journey to the Cross-roads
text: Resolution: Each player who chose to shuffle a copy of Brace of Coneys into his deck during setup has earned that boon. Add each earned copy to the campaign pool. Record the name and quantity of each enemy underneath The Black Gate in the notes section of the campaign log.

name: The Stairs of Cirith Ungol
text: Setup: Set Cleft of Cirith Ungol, Shelob and The Great Spider encounter set aside, out of play. Put Smeagol into play under the first player's control. Make Morgul Vale the active location. Add Smeagol's Secret Way to the staging area.

name: The Stairs of Cirith Ungol
text: Progress cannot be placed on Underground locations.  Response: After Smeagol's Secret Way is explored, discard 3 random cards from each player's hand to discard each Nazgul enemy in the staging area.  Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if Smeagol's Secret Way is in the victory display, advance to stage 2A.

name: The Spider's Pass
text: When Revealed: Add Shelob to the staging area and shuffle all cards from The Great Spider encounter set and the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

name: The Spider's Pass
text: Shelob cannot leave the staging area and Smeagol cannot attack or defend.  Each player cannot play, or put into play, more than 1 ally each round. No more than 4 progress can be placed on this stage each round.

name: Gollum's Betrayal
text: When Revealed: Add Cleft of Cirith Ungol to the staging area. Flip Smeagol to Gollum and heal all damage from Shelob. Each player places 1 resource on Shelob.

name: Gollum's Betrayal
text: If Gollum is defeated, add him to the victory display. (Do not flip him over.)  While Shelob has at least 1 resource on her, she gains: "Forced: When Shelob is dealt any amount of damage, cancel that damage and discard 1 resource from Shelob instead."   The players cannot defeat this stage unless Shelob and Gollum are in the victor display. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

name: Shelob's Lair
text: Setup: Attach A Heavy Burden to the Ringbearer. Remove each burden with the following burden set icons from the encounter deck and each player's deck: RD, RtI.

name: Shelob's Lair
text: Resolution: Add A Heavy Burden to the campaign pool. The players have earned that burden.

name: Gollum
keywords: Immune to non-[fellowship] player card effects. Gollum engages the first player.
text: Forced: After Gollum engages the first player during the refresh phase, he makes an immediate attack. Forced: When Gollum is defeated, flip him to Smeagol and exhaust Smeagol.

name: Smeagol
keywords: Immune to player card effects. The first player gains control of Smeagol.
text: Forced: After the players quest unsuccessfully, flip Smeagol to Gollum.  If Smeagol is destroyed, the players lose the game.

name: Aragorn
text: The first player gains control of Aragorn. If Aragorn leaves play, the players lose the game. While Aragorn has an Artifact attached to him, he gains sentinel and does not exhaust to quest.

name: Éowyn
text: Setup: Reduce your threat by 3. Action: Raise your threat by 3 to ready Eowyn. She gets +9 [attack] until the end of the phase. (Limit once per game for the group.)

name: Beregond
text: Response: After Beregond defends an attack and takes no damage, reduce the defending player's threat by 1. (Limit once per round.)

name: Grimbold
text: Combat Action: Discard Grimbold to choose an enemy engaged with a player. That enemy cannot attack that player this phase.

name: Prince Imrahil
text: While there is a hero card in your discard pile, Prince Imrahil loses the ally card type and gains the hero card type.

name: Halbarad
text: Reduce the cost to play Halbarad by 1 for each enemy engaged with you. Each enemy engaged with you gets +10 engagement cost.

name: Ghân-buri-Ghân
text: X is the [threat] of the active location. Travel Action: Discard Ghan-buri-Ghan to travel to a location without resolving its Travel cost.

name: Sterner than Steel
text: Response: Exhaust a Weapon or Armor card attached to the defending character to cancel a shadow effect just triggered in combat.

name: Desperate Defense
text: Response: After a sentinel character is declared as a defender, it gets +2 [defense] for this attack. If this attack deals no damage, ready the defending character.

name: Golden Shield
text: Attach to a Rohan hero. Restricted. Response: After attached hero is declared as a defender, exhaust Golden Shield to add attached hero's [willpower] to its [defense] for this attack.

name: Livery of the Tower
text: Attach to a Gondor hero. Limit 1 per hero. Response: Spend X resource from attached hero's pool to cancel X damage just dealt to attached hero.

name: Roheryn
text: Attach to a Dunedain hero. If attached hero is Aragorn, he gains the [tactics] icon. Response: After you optionally engage an enemy, exhaust Roheryn and attached hero to declare that hero as an attacker (and resolve its attack) against that enemy.

name: Banner of Elendil
text: Attach to Aragorn. While Aragorn is questing, each other questing character you control gets +1 [willpower]. While Aragorn is attacking, each other attacking character you control gets +1 [attack].

name: Esquire of Rohan
text: Setup: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains the Rohan trait. Attached hero gets +1 [attack] while attacking with another Rohan character.

name: Esquire of Gondor
text: Setup: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains the Gondor trait. Attached hero gets +1 [willpower] while committed to the quest with another Gondor character.

name: Overcome by Fear
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: Setup: Attach to your threat dial. Limit 1 per threat dial.  Your threat cannot be reduced. Forced: At the end of the round, raise your threat by 1. Then, you may spend 1 [fellowship] resource to detach Overcome by Fear and set it aside, out of play.

name: The Stone of Erech
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: Immune to player card effects. Forced: After The Stone of Erech becomes the active location, each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an Oathbreaker enemy and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. Travel: Remove 5 progress from stage 3B to travel here.

name: Dark Door
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: While Dark Door is in the staging area, progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area. Travel: The first player reveals an encounter card to travel here.

name: Trysting Place
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: While Trysting Place is in the staging area, each enemy in the staging area cannot take damage. Travel: The first player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an Oathbreaker enemy and puts it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Deadly Road
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: While Deadly Road is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After a 'when revealed' effect is canceled, raise each player's threat by 1." Travel: Spend 1 [fellowship] resource to travel here.

name: Haunted Path
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: Haunted Path gets +1 [threat] for each player with threat 35 or higher. Travel: Raise each player's threat by 1 to travel here.
shadow: Shadow: Either raise your threat by 2, or return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.

name: Dead Man of Dunharrow
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: Forced: After Dead Man of Dunharrow engages you, either attach a set aside Overcome by Fear to your threat dial, or raise your threat by 2.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack].

name: Faithless Dead
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: When Revealed: Either raise each player's threat by 2, or reveal an additional encounter card.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack] and loses the Phantom keyword for this attack.

name: Ghosts of Men
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: When Revealed: Either attach a set aside Overcome by Fear to your threat dial, or Ghosts of Men makes an immediate attack against you.

name: Shadow Host
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: Forced: After Shadow Host engages you, either attach a set aside Overcome by Fear to your threat dial, or it makes an immediate attack.

name: Blood Runs Chill
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: When Revealed: Each player with threat 35 or higher deals 1 damage to each exhausted character he controls.
shadow: Shadow: If your threat is 35 or higher, defending character cannot ready until the end of the round.

name: The Way is Shut
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: When Revealed: Either attach a set aside Overcome by Fear to your threat dial, or progress cannot be placed on the current quest until the end of the round.

name: Whispers in the Dark
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: When Revealed: Either attach a set aside Overcome by Fear to your threat dial, or each character you control gets -1 [willpower], -1 [attack], and -1 [defense] until the end of the round.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack] (+2 [attack] instead if undefended).

name: No Turning Back
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either attach a set aside Overcome by Fear to your threat dial, or discard an ally you control.
shadow: Shadow: Either attach a set aside Overcome by Fear to your threat dial, or attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.

name: Great Corsair Ship
text: X is the number of resources on The Corsiar Fleet. The players cannot travel here unless there are at least 3 Ship locations in the victory display. Travel: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Corsair enemy and adds it to the staging area. One of those enemies must be Corsair Captain, if able.

name: Umbar War Galley
text: While Umbar War Galley is the active location, each Corsair enemy gets -10 engagement cost. Travel: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until a Corsair enemy is discarded. Add the discarded enemy to the staging area.

name: Corsair Dromon
text: While Corsair Dromon is the active location, each Corsair enemy gains Archery 1. Travel: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until a Corsair enemy is discarded. Add the discarded enemy to the staging area.

name: Port of Pelargir
text: While Port of Pelargir is in the staging area, no more than 1 damage can be healed from each character each round.
shadow: Shadow: If this attack damages a character, that character cannot ready until the end of the round.

name: Pelargir Quays
text: Forced: At the end of the round, place 1 damage token here. Then, if there are 4 damage tokens here, discard Pelargir Quays and assign 4 damage among characters in play.

name: Corsair Captain
text: Cannot be optionally engaged. If the active location is a Ship, Corsair Captain gets -30 engagement cost and gains: "Forced: When Corsair Captain engages you, it makes an immediate attack."

name: Corsair of Umbar
text: If the active location is a Ship, Corsair of Umbar gets +2 [attack] and +2 [defense].
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack] (+2 [attack] instead if the active location is a Ship).

name: Umbar Pirate Crew
text: Cannot have attachments. Forced: When Umbar Pirate Crew engages you, exhaust a character you control.
shadow: Shadow: If the active location is a Ship, return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.

name: Haradrim Pirate
text: Forced: When Haradrim Pirate engages you, deal 1 damage to a character you control (2 damage instead if the active location is a Ship).
shadow: Shadow: Defending character gets -1 [defense] for each damage on it.

name: Fell Folk of Umbar
text: When Revealed: Either return each Corsair enemy engaged with you to the staging area, or discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a Corsair enemy is discarded and put that enemy into play engaged with you.

name: Black Sails
text: When Revealed: Each Ship location in the staging area gets +1 [threat]. If there are no non-unique Ship locations in the staging area, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Ship location and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Raiding the Coasts
text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either add 3 to the total [threat] in the staging area until the end of the phase, or discard the highest cost attachment you control.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. If this attack destroys a character, discard an attachment you control.

name: Driven to the Brink
text: When Revealed: Either immediately end the quest phase (without resolving the quest), or assign X damage among questing characters you control. X is the number of resources on The Corsair Fleet.
shadow: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.

name: Minas Tirith
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Gondor. City Minas Tirith has 30 hit points plus 10 for each player. Forced: At the end of the round, deal 1 damage to Minas Tirith for each enemy in the staging area. Then, if Minas Tirith has no hit points remaining, the players lose the game.

name: Grond
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Immune to player card effects.  X is the number of resources here. Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, place 1 resource on Grond. Then, deal X damage to Minas Tirith. Travel: The Witch-king makes an immediate attack against each player, in turn order.

name: Gate of Gondor
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Immune to player card effects.  While Gate of Gondor is the active location, each enemy in play gets -30 engagement cost. Forced: When Gate of Gondor is explored, return each engaged enemy to the staging area.

name: City Wall
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: While City Wall is the active location, damage that would be placed on Minas Tirith must be placed here first. Forced: When City Wall has damage equal to its quest points, discard it. Then, each player raises his threat by 3.

name: Pelennor Field
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: While at least 1 enemy is in the staging area, progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack] (+2 [attack] instead if it has the Harad trait).

name: Fire-filled Trench
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Forced: When a player plays an event that would cancel the effects of a treachery card just revealed from the encounter deck, cancel the effects of that event. Then, discard Fire-filled Trench.

name: Siege Tower
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: While Siege Tower is in the staging area, it gains Archery 3. Forced: After Siege Tower becomes the active location, shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until an enemy is discarded. Add the discarded enemy to the staging area.

name: The Black Serpent
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Cannot have attachments or be attacked by more than 1 character at a time. When Revealed: The Black Serpent makes an immediate attack against the first player.

name: War Mumak
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Cannot have attachments or take more than 3 damage each round. Forced: When War Mumak is defeated, reduce each player's threat by 4.

name: Southron Champion
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Forced: After Southron Champion is dealt a shadow card with no shadow effect, either deal 3 damage to Minas Tirith, or it makes an additional attack after this one.
shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to Minas Tirith.

name: Morgul Captain
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: When Revealed: Put the topmost Orc enemy in the discard pile into play engaged with you.
shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, return attacking enemy to the staging area.

name: Orc of the Eye
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: When Revealed: Either deal 2 damage to a hero you control, or deal 2 damage to Minas Tirith.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack] (+2 [attack] instead if it is an Orc).

name: Mordor Orc
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: While Minas Tirith is in play, undefended damage dealt by Mordor Orc must be assigned to Minas Tirith.
shadow: Shadow: If Minas Tirith is in play, engage Mordor Orc and deal it a shadow card.

name: The Rammas is Breached
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and puts it into play engaged with him.
shadow: Shadow: Either deal 3 damage to Minas Tirith, or attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.

name: Fell Beast
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: When Revealed: Attach to a Nazgul enemy. Limit 1 per enemy. (Counts as a Mount attachment with the text: "Attached enemy gets +1 [threat], +1 [attack], +1 [defense] and -10 engagement cost. Forced: At the end of the round, return attached enemy to the staging area.")

name: Black Dart
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: When Revealed: Remove a hero you control from the quest and attach Black Dark to that hero. Limit 1 per hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: At the end of the round, deal 1 damage to attached hero.")
shadow: Shadow: If this attack damages a hero, attach Black Dart to that hero.

name: Spells of Ruin
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: When Revealed: Either deal 1 damage to each exhausted character, or deal 5 damage to Minas Tirith.
shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 [attack]. If this attack destroys a character, deal 2 damage to Minas Tirith.

name: Dread and Despair
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: When Revealed: Discard an ally you control. Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the total [threat] in the staging area for each ally in your discard pile.
shadow: Shadow: Discard a non-objective attachment you control.

name: Shadow of Mordor
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: When Revealed: Each player deals 1 damage to a hero he controls. Until the end of the round, treat the printed text box of each damaged character as if it were blank, except for Traits.

name: Wraith on Wings
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Setup: Add Wraith on Wings to the staging area. Cannot have non-Morgul attachments. Wraith on Wings gets +1 [threat] and -1 engagement cost for each resource on it. (Limit 5.) Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, place 1 resource on Wraith on Wings.

name: The Forbidden Door
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: Setup: Set The Stone of Erech and Army of the Dead aside, out of play. Each player attaches a copy of Overcome by Fear to his threat dial. Remove each unattached copy of Overcome by Fear from the game.

name: The Forbidden Door
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: When Revealed: Each player may add 1 resource to the resource pool of each hero he controls. Each player who does so must raise his threat by 3. Forced: At the end of the planning phase, discard all cards in each player's hand and advance to stage 2A.

name: The Paths of the Dead
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck for a different location and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: The Paths of the Dead
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: X is the threat of the player with the highest threat. Each player cannot reduce his threat below his initial threat level. Forced: At the beginning of the planning phase each player must choose: either raise your threat by 1, or you cannot play cards this phase.

name: The Dead are Following
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: When Revealed: Add The Stone of Erech and Army of the Dead (enemy side faceup) to the staging area. Each player may raise his threat by 3 to detach Overcome by Fear from his threat dial and set it aside, out of play.

name: The Dead are Following
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: While Stone of Erech is the active location, each Oathbreaker enemy loses the Phantom keyword and gets -20 engagement cost. When The Stone of Erech leaves play as an explored location, the players win the game.

name: The Passing of the Grey Company
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
traits: The Lord of the Rings Part 13
text: Setup: Each player may change heroes without incurring the +1 threat penalty. The first player may raise each player's threat by 1 to search his deck for Anduril and add it to his hand. Remove each burden with the following burden set icons from the encounter deck:

name: The Passing of the Grey Company
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: Resolution: Add each copy of Overcome by Fear attached to a player's threat dial to the campaign pool and record the name of each player it was attached to. If Army of the Dead is in the victory display, add the Army of the Dead boon to the campaign pool. The players have earned each card added to the campaign pool.

name: Army of the Dead
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: Immune to player card effects. X is twice the number of players in the game. Forced: When Army of the Dead attacks, you must either attach a set aside Overcome by Fear to your threat dial, or discard an ally you control.

name: Army of the Dead
text: Immune to player card effects. The first player gains control of Army of the Dead. If Army of the Dead leaves play, remove it from the game.

name: Attack on Pelargir
text: Setup: Add The Corsair Fleet (Corsair side faceup) and Great Corsair Ship to the staging area. Each player searches the encounter deck for a Ship location and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Attack on Pelargir
text: Each Ship location in the staging area is immune to player card effects. The players cannot defeat this stage while Great Corsair Ship is in play. When this stage is defeated, the players win the game.

name: The Siege of Gondor
traits: The Lord of the Rings Part 14
text: Setup: The first player may raise each player's threat by 1 to search his deck for Anduril and add it to his hand. Remove each burden with the following burden set icons from the encounter deck:

name: The Siege of Gondor
text: Resolution: Count the number of resources on The Corsair Fleet and record that number in the notes section of the quest log. Remove Army of the Dead from the campaign pool.

name: The Corsair Fleet
text: Forced: At the beginning of the staging step, place 1 resource on this objective. Then, each player must choose: either reveal an encounter card, or assign X damage among characters he controls. X is the number of resources on this objective. ...ships of great draught with many oars, and with black sails bellying in the breeze. -The Return of the King

name: The Corsair Fleet
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, remove 1 resource from The Corsair Fleet. Then, if there are no resources here, the first player takes control of Aragorn and adds The Corsair Fleet to the victory display.

name: The Garrison of Gondor
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Setup: Set Minas Tirith, Grond, The Witch-king, and each copy of Wraith on Wings aside, out of play. Search the encounter deck for a copy of Pelennor Field and make it the active location. Shuffle the encounter deck. The players may attach Esquire of Rohan and Esquire of Gondor to different heroes.

name: The Garrison of Gondor
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Skip the quest phase and combat phase. Forced: At the end of the planning phase, place 1 progress here.

name: Retreat from Osgiliath
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: When Revealed: Each player adds 1 set aside Wraith on Wings to the staging area and reveals an encounter card. Starting with the first player, each player discards cards from the top of his deck until he discards an ally that is not in play. Put the discarded ally into play in the staging area and treat its text box as if it were blank until the end of the phase.

name: Retreat from Osgiliath
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: X is the total cost of each ally in the staging area.  Allies in the staging area are treated as if their text box is blank, are immune to player card effects, and are under no player's control. Forced: At the end of the round, assign damage among allies in the staging area equal to the number of enemies in the staging area.

name: The White City Besieged
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: When Revealed: Each player takes control of each ally he owns in the staging area and exhausts it. The first player adds Minas Tirith, Grond, and The Witch-king (Captain side faceup) to the staging area. Each other player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a different enemy and adds it to the staging area.

name: The White City Besieged
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Assault.  The White City Besieged gets +4 quest points for each player.  The players cannot travel to Pelennor locations. Forced: When an enemy is destroyed, place progress on this stage equal to its total [threat] (progress must be placed on any active location first).

name: Rohan has Come!
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: When Revealed: Set The Witch-king aside, out of play. Each player searches the top 10 cards of his deck for an ally that matches the sphere of a hero he controls and puts it into play under his control. Each player shuffles his deck.

name: Rohan has Come!
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Progress that would be placed on this stage by questing successfully is instead assigned as damage among enemies in play. (Progress must be placed on the active location first.) Forced: At the end of the quest phase, advance to stage 5A.

name: Fighting in the Fields
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: When Revealed: The first player adds The Witch-king to the staging area (Sorcerer side faceup). Then, he searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Fell Beast and attaches it to The Witch-king, if able. Each other player reveals an encounter card.

name: Fighting in the Fields
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: The Witch-king and encounter cards dealt to The Witch-king are immune to player card effects. Forced: When an enemy attacks and destroys a character, deal 1 damage to Minas Tirith. The players cannot defeat this stage unless Aragorn is in play and The Witch-king is in the victory display. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

name: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
traits: The Lord of the Rings Part 15
text: Setup: Set each Harad enemy recorded in the campaign log aside, out of play. The first player attaches Anduril and Banner of Elendil to Aragorn and sets him aside, out of play. Add The Corsair Fleet to the staging area (Gondor side faceup) and place X resources on it, where X is the number recorded in the campaign log. Remove each burden with the following burden set icons from the encounter deck, then flip this card over:

name: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Forced: When the players advance to stage 5B, add each set aside Harad enemy to the staging area. Resolution: Add 1 copy, per player, of Wraith on Wings to the campaign pool. The players have earned those burdens. If Esquire of Gondor, or Esquire of Rohan, is attached to a hero, that hero's controller has earned that boon.

name: The Witch-king
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Immune to player card effects.  Cannot be optionally engaged or take damage. Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, discard cards from the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded. Add the discarded enemy to the staging area.

name: The Witch-king
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Only the engaged player can declare attackers against The Witch-king.  Forced: At the beginning of the envounter phase, The Witch-king engages the first player. Then, it makes an immediate attack.

name: The Passing of the Grey Company
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company
text: Phantom: During the "determine combat damage" step of an attack made by an enemy with Phantom, if any damage would be dealt by the attack, it is cancelled and the defending player raises his threat by an equal amount instead.

name: The Passing of the Grey Company
encounterSet: The Passing of the Grey Company

name: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
text: Assault: Progress cannot be placed on the quest stage by player card effects or by questing successfully. However, progress can still be placed on the active location as normal. When the players quest unsuccessfully, each player does not raise his threat. Instead, the players must deal X damage to Minas Tirith. X is the amount by which the total threat in the staging area was greater than the total willpower of each character committed to the quest.

name: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
encounterSet: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields

name: Frodo Baggins
text: Planning Action: Exhaust The One Ring to add 1 resource to a hero's pool.

name: Aragorn
text: The first player gains control of Aragorn. Action: Spend 1 resource from Aragorn's pool to ready Aragorn. (Limit once per phase.) If Aragorn leaves play, the players lose the game.

name: Eomer
text: Response: After Eomer commits to the quest, spend 1 resource from his resource pool to declare him as an attacker (and resolve his attack) against an enemy in the staging area.

name: Tom Cotton
text: While you are engaged with an enemy with engagement cost higher than your threat, the first Hobbit ally you play each round does not require a resource match. Response: After a Hobbit ally enters play, it gets +2 [attack] until the end of the round.

name: Rosie Cotton
